GR14jnass01u:3: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya atha maṅgalācaraṇam nārāyaṇaṃ namas kṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
GR14jnass01u:4: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet //
GR14jnass01u:6: kumārādyāś ca munayaḥ siddhāś ca kapilādayaḥ // Jss_1,1.1 //
GR14jnass01u:7: lakṣmī sarasvatī durgā sāvitrī rādhikā parā /
GR14jnass01u:8: bhaktyā namanti yaṃ śaśvat taṃ namāmi parāt paraṃ // Jss_1,1.2 //
GR14jnass01u:9: dhyāyante satataṃ santo yogino vaiṣṇavās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:11: dhyāyet taṃ paramaṃ brahma paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:12: nirīham ati-nirliptam nirguṇaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,1.4 //
GR14jnass01u:14: satyaṃ nityaṃ ca puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ param avyayam // Jss_1,1.5 //
GR14jnass01u:16: svecchā-mayaṃ paraṃ dhāma bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,1.6 //
GR14jnass01u:17: stuvanti vedā yaṃ śaśvann ānantaṃ jānanti yasya te /
GR14jnass01u:18: taṃ staumi paramānandaṃ sānandaṃ nanda-nandanam // Jss_1,1.7 //
GR14jnass01u:20: śrīdaṃ śrīśaṃ śrī-nivāsaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ rādhikeśvaram // Jss_1,1.8 //
GR14jnass01u:22: parāvarāc ca paramād yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guroḥ // Jss_1,1.9 //
GR14jnass01u:24: taj jñāna-mantha-daṇḍena saṃnirmathya navaṃ navam // Jss_1,1.10 //
GR14jnass01u:27: oṃ nārāyaṇāśrame puṇye puṇya-kṣetre ca bhārata /
GR14jnass01u:31: japantaṃ paramaṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity akṣara-dvayam /
GR14jnass01u:33: papraccha śukadevaś ca sarva-jñaṃ pitaraṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:34: kāraṇaṇ ca purāṇānāṃ purāṇaṃ param avyayam // Jss_1,1.15 //
GR14jnass01u:36: yad yat prakāraṃ jñānaṃ ca nigūḍhaṃ śruti-sammatam // Jss_1,1.16 //
GR14jnass01u:38: tat tat sarvaṃ samālocya māṃ bodhayitum arhasi // Jss_1,1.17 //
GR14jnass01u:40: sa pitā jñāna-dātā yo jñānaṃ tat kṛṣṇa-bhaktidam /
GR14jnass01u:41: sā bhaktiḥ paramā śuddhā kṛṣṇa-dāsya-pradā ca yā // Jss_1,1.18 //
GR14jnass01u:42: tad eva dāsyaṃ śastaṃ yat sākṣāc caraṇa-sevanaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:43: nityaṃ goloka-vāsaṃ ca purataḥ stavanaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,1.19 //
GR14jnass01u:47: bhaktānāṃ vāñcchitaṃ vastu sāra-bhūtaṃ śrutau śrutam // Jss_1,1.21 //
GR14jnass01u:48: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vyāsadevo jahāsa saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:49: vijñāya jñāninaṃ putraṃ paramāhlādam āpa ha // Jss_1,1.22 //
GR14jnass01u:52: śrī-vyāsa uvāca śuka dhanyo 'si mānyo 'si puṇya-rūpo 'si bhārate /
GR14jnass01u:53: putreṇa bhavatāsmākaṃ kulaṃ muktaṃ ca pāvanam // Jss_1,1.24 //
GR14jnass01u:54: sa putraḥ kṛṣṇa-bhakto yo bhārate suyaśas-karaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:55: punāti puṃsāṃ śatakaṃ janma-mātreṇa līlayā // Jss_1,1.25 //
GR14jnass01u:57: sodarān bāndhavāṃś caiva bhṛtyān patnīṃ sahātmajām // Jss_1,1.26 //
GR14jnass01u:61: kṛṣṇa-bhakto vasiṣṭas tu tat suto vaiṣṇavaḥ svayam // Jss_1,1.28 //
GR14jnass01u:66: gurur me bhagavān sākṣād yogīndro nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:67: guror gurur me śambhuś ca yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guruḥ // Jss_1,1.31 //
GR14jnass01u:68: teṣāṃ puṇyena putras tvaṃ puṇya-rāśiś ca mūrtimān /
GR14jnass01u:69: padmānāṃ mama puṃsāṃ ca prakāśo bhāskaraḥ svayam // Jss_1,1.32 //
GR14jnass01u:71: sarasvatīṃ namas kṛtya jñānaṃ vakṣye sanātanam // Jss_1,1.33 //
GR14jnass01u:73: pañca-saṃvādam iṣṭaṃ ca bhaktānām abhivāñcchitam // Jss_1,1.34 //
GR14jnass01u:74: prāṇādhikaṃ priyaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ śubhaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:75: atha ṣaṭ-saṃvādāḥ ?what? hi goloke śata-śṛṅge ca parvate // Jss_1,1.35 //
GR14jnass01u:77: purato rādhikāyāś ca brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam // Jss_1,1.36 //
GR14jnass01u:78: tam uvāca mahā-bhaktaṃ stuvantaṃ praṇataṃ sutam /
GR14jnass01u:79: pañca-rātram idaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā ca jagatāṃ vidhiḥ // Jss_1,1.37 //
GR14jnass01u:81: bhaktyā tam pūjayām āsa śaṅkaraḥ paramādaram // Jss_1,1.38 //
GR14jnass01u:82: sukhāsane sukhāsīnaṃ svasthaṃ bhaktaṃ ca pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:83: papraccha vārtāṃ vinayī vinayena sukhāvahām // Jss_1,1.39 //
GR14jnass01u:84: sarvaṃ taṃ kathayām āsa pañca-rātrādikaṃ śubham /
GR14jnass01u:85: vasantaṃ vaṭa-mūle ca svarge mandākinī-taṭe // Jss_1,1.40 //
GR14jnass01u:86: yogīndrair api siddhendrair munīndraiś ca stutaṃ prabhuṃ /
GR14jnass01u:87: jñānāmṛtaṃ tam uktvā sa brahma-lokaṃ jagāma ha // Jss_1,1.41 //
GR14jnass01u:88: śambhuś ca kathayām āsa sva-śiṣyaṃ nāradaṃ munim /
GR14jnass01u:89: nāradaḥ kathayām āsa puṣkare sūrya-parvaṇi // Jss_1,1.42 //
GR14jnass01u:90: māṃ bhaktam anuraktaṃ ca puṇyāhe muni-saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:93: rātraṃ ca jñāna-vacanaṃ jñānaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ smṛtam /
GR14jnass01u:94: tenedaṃ pañca-rātraṃ ca pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ // Jss_1,1.44 //
GR14jnass01u:96: tato mṛtyuñjayaḥ śambhuḥ saṃprāpa kṛṣṇa-vaktrataḥ // Jss_1,1.45 //
GR14jnass01u:97: jñānam dvitīyaṃ paramaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ ca vāñcchitam /
GR14jnass01u:98: paraṃ mukti-pradaṃ śuddhaṃ yato līnaṃ hareḥ pade // Jss_1,1.46 //
GR14jnass01u:99: jñānaṃ śuddhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ kṛṣṇa-bhaktidam /
GR14jnass01u:100: tad-dāsyam adhīṣṭaṃ ca yato dāsyaṃ labhed dhareḥ // Jss_1,1.47 //
GR14jnass01u:102: sarvasvaṃ yogināṃ putra siddhānāṃ ca sukha-pradam // Jss_1,1.48 //
GR14jnass01u:103: aṇimā laghimā vyāptiḥ prākāmyaṃ mahimā tathā /
GR14jnass01u:104: īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca tathākāmāvasāyitā // Jss_1,1.49 //
GR14jnass01u:108: siddhaṃ ca ṣoḍaśa-vidhaṃ jñānināṃ ca yato bhavet // Jss_1,1.51 //
GR14jnass01u:109: jñānaṃ ca paramaṃ proktaṃ tad vai vaiṣayikaṃ nṛṇāṃ /
GR14jnass01u:110: yad iṣṭa-devī māyā sā paraṃ saṃmoha-kāraṇaṃ // Jss_1,1.52 //
GR14jnass01u:112: poṣanaṃ sva-kuṭumbānāṃ svātmanaś ca niranratam // Jss_1,1.53 //
GR14jnass01u:113: prathamaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca tad eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:114: nairguṇyaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca sarvataḥ param // Jss_1,1.54 //
GR14jnass01u:115: caturtham ca rājasikaṃ bhaktas tan nābhivāñcchati /
GR14jnass01u:116: pañcamaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ vidvāṃs tan nābhivāñcchati // Jss_1,1.55 //
GR14jnass01u:117: jñānaṃ pañca-vidhaṃ proktaṃ pañca-rātraṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:118: pañca-rātraṃ sapta-vidhaṃ jñānināṃ jñānadaṃ param // Jss_1,1.56 //
GR14jnass01u:119: brāhmaṃ śaivaṃ ca kaumāraṃ vāsiṣṭaṃ kāpilaṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:120: gautamīyaṃ nāradīyam idaṃ sapta-vidhaṃ smṛtam // Jss_1,1.57 //
GR14jnass01u:122: ṣaṭ pañca-rātraṃ vedāś ca purāṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:123: itihāsaṃ dharma-śāstraṃ śātraṃ ca siddhi-yoga-jam // Jss_1,1.58 //
GR14jnass01u:124: dṛṣṭvā sarvaṃ samālokya jñānaṃ saṃprāpya śaṅkarāt /
GR14jnass01u:125: jñānāmṛtaṃ pañca-rātraṃ cakāra nārado muniḥ // Jss_1,1.59 //
GR14jnass01u:127: sarvasvaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca priyaṃ prāṇādhikaṃ suta // Jss_1,1.60 //
GR14jnass01u:131: paripūrṇatamaḥ śrīmān yathā kṛṣṇaḥ sureṣu ca // Jss_1,1.62 //
GR14jnass01u:132: yathā devīṣu pūjyā sā mūla-prakṛtir īśvarī /
GR14jnass01u:133: vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ jñānināṃ yogināṃ śivaḥ // Jss_1,1.63 //
GR14jnass01u:135: brahmā ca veda-viduṣāṃ pūjyānāṃ ca gaṇeśvaraḥ // Jss_1,1.64 //
GR14jnass01u:137: bṛhaspatir buddhimatāṃ siddhānāṃ kapilo yathā // Jss_1,1.65 //
GR14jnass01u:138: yogīndrānāṃ satāṃ śuddha ṛṣir nārāyaṇo yathā /
GR14jnass01u:139: kavīnāṃ ca yathā śukraḥ paṇḍitānāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ // Jss_1,1.66 //
GR14jnass01u:140: saritām ca yathā gaṅgā samudrāṇāṃ jalārṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:141: vṛndāvanaṃ vanānāṃ ca varṣānāṃ bhārataṃ yathā // Jss_1,1.67 //
GR14jnass01u:142: puṣkaraṃ tatra tīrthānāṃ pūjyānāṃ vaiṣṇavo yathā /
GR14jnass01u:143: ātmākāśo yathāptānāṃ yathā kāśī purīṣu ca // Jss_1,1.68 //
GR14jnass01u:145: puṣpāṇāṃ pārijātaś ca patrāṇāṃ tulasī yathā // Jss_1,1.69 //
GR14jnass01u:146: mantrāṇāṃ kṛṣṇa-mantraś ca yathā vidyā dhaneṣv api /
GR14jnass01u:147: yathā tejasvināṃ sūryo miṣṭānām amṛtaṃ yathā // Jss_1,1.70 //
GR14jnass01u:148: ādhārāṇāṃ ca sthūlānāṃ mahā-viṣṇur yathā suta /
GR14jnass01u:149: sūkṣmāṇāṃ paramāṇuś ca guruṇāṃ mantra-tantra-daḥ // Jss_1,1.71 //
GR14jnass01u:150: putraś ca sneha-pātrāṇāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā śaśī /
GR14jnass01u:151: yathā ghṛtaṃ ca gavyānāṃ śasyānāṃ dhānyam īpsitam // Jss_1,1.72 //
GR14jnass01u:152: śāstrāṇāṃ ca yathā vedāḥ sāśramāṇāṃ yathā dvijaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:154: yathā chandasi gāyatrī durgā śaktimatīṣv api /
GR14jnass01u:155: pati-vratāsu laksmīś ca kṣamāśīlāsu medinī // Jss_1,1.74 //
GR14jnass01u:157: hanumān vānarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ garuḍo yathā // Jss_1,1.75 //
GR14jnass01u:159: śālagrāmaś ca yantrāṇāṃ pūjāsu kṛṣṇa-pūjanam // Jss_1,1.76 //
GR14jnass01u:160: ekādaśī vratānāṃ ca tapaḥsv anaśanaṃ yathā /
GR14jnass01u:161: yajñānāṃ japa-yajñaś ca satyaṃ dharmeṣu putraka // Jss_1,1.77 //
GR14jnass01u:162: suśīlaṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca puṇyeṣu kṛṣṇa-kīrtanam /
GR14jnass01u:163: śobhāśu sukha-dṛśyeṣu prabhā tejaḥsu sarvataḥ // Jss_1,1.78 //
GR14jnass01u:165: lokānām api lokeśaḥ śeṣo nāgeṣu pūjitaḥ // Jss_1,1.79 //
GR14jnass01u:166: sudarśanaṃ ca śastrāṇāṃ viśvakarmā ca śilpinām /
GR14jnass01u:167: dharmiṣṭheṣu dayāvatsu devarṣisu mahatsu ca // Jss_1,1.80 //
GR14jnass01u:169: evaṃ ca sarva-śāstreṣu pañca-rātraṃ ca pūjitam // Jss_1,1.81 //
GR14jnass01u:170: yathā nipīya pīyūṣaṃ na spṛhā cānya-vastuṣu /
GR14jnass01u:171: pañca-rātram abhijñāya nānyeṣu ca spṛhā satām // Jss_1,1.82 //
GR14jnass01u:176: śuka uvāca kutra vā pañca-rātraṃ ca nāradasya ca dhīmate /
GR14jnass01u:177: pradattaṃ śambhunā tāta tan me vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,2.1 //
GR14jnass01u:179: vyāsa uvāca adhītya sarvān vedāṃś ca vedāṅgāṇ pitur antike /
GR14jnass01u:180: jagāma tītrhaṃ kedāraṃ supraśastaṃ ca bhārate // Jss_1,2.2 //
GR14jnass01u:183: tapaś cakāra sa munir divyaṃ varṣa-sahasrakam /
GR14jnass01u:184: pitroktenaiva vidhinā satataṃ saṃyutaḥ śuciḥ // Jss_1,2.4 //
GR14jnass01u:188: aśarīriṣy uvāca ādhārito yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:189: nādhārito yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:190: antar bahir yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim /
GR14jnass01u:191: nāntar bahir yadi haris tapasā tataḥ kim // Jss_1,2.6 //
GR14jnass01u:192: virama virama brahman kiṃ tapasyāsu vatsa /
GR14jnass01u:193: vraja vraja dvija śīghraṃ śaṅkaraṃ jñāna-sindhum /
GR14jnass01u:196: iti śrutvā ca sa munir vimanāḥ svar-ṇadī-taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:197: cakārārthānusandhānaṃ na prasannam ca tan manaḥ // Jss_1,2.8 //
GR14jnass01u:198: ruroda svar-ṇadī-tīre smāraṃ smāraṃ hareḥ padam /
GR14jnass01u:199: dadarśa puratas tātaṃ brahmāṇaṃ sakumārakam // Jss_1,2.9 //
GR14jnass01u:200: nanāma sahasā mūrdhnā pitaraṃ taṃ sahodaram /
GR14jnass01u:201: pādyam arghyaṃ ca pradadau javena sādaraṃ muniḥ // Jss_1,2.10 //
GR14jnass01u:203: sukhāsīnaṃ susthiraṃ ca sasmitaṃ ca gata-śramam // Jss_1,2.11 //
GR14jnass01u:204: svātmārāmaṃ pūrṇa-kāmaṃ jñānināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:206: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā taṃ kātaraṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:207: putreṇa sārddham ālocya vyākhyāṃ kartuṃ samārebhe // Jss_1,2.13 //
GR14jnass01u:209: brahmovāca he vatsa pūrva-ślokārthaṃ nigūḍhaṃ śruti-sammatam /
GR14jnass01u:210: vedārthaṃ dvi-vidhaṃ śuddhaṃ vyākhyāṃ kurvanti vaidikāḥ // Jss_1,2.14 //
GR14jnass01u:211: ārādhito yadi harir yena puṃsā sva-bhaktitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:212: kiṃ tasya tapasā vyarthaṃ tīrtha-pūtasya nārada // Jss_1,2.15 //
GR14jnass01u:216: punāti sva-sva-bhaktaṃ ca cāndhavaṃś cāvalīlayā // Jss_1,2.17 //
GR14jnass01u:217: nahi dharmo nahi tapaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-sevanāt param /
GR14jnass01u:218: pariśramaṃ ca viphalaṃ tapasā vaiṣṇavasya ca // Jss_1,2.18 //
GR14jnass01u:220: tīrtha-snānam anaśanaṃ vedeṣu ca viḍambanam // Jss_1,2.19 //
GR14jnass01u:222: mantra-grahaṇa-mātreṇa naṣṭaṃ vahnau yathā tṛṇam // Jss_1,2.20 //
GR14jnass01u:223: pavitraḥ paramo vahniḥ pavitraṃ cāmalaṃ jalaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:224: pavitraṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tīrthaṃ yat tulasī-dalam // Jss_1,2.21 //
GR14jnass01u:226: upasparśa ca bhaktasyāpy ete vāñcchanti sādaram // Jss_1,2.22 //
GR14jnass01u:230: tat-pādodaka-naivedyaṃ nityaṃ bhuṅkte ca yaḥ pumān // Jss_1,2.24 //
GR14jnass01u:232: punāti puṃsāṃ śatakaṃ janma-mātrāt sabāndhavam // Jss_1,2.25 //
GR14jnass01u:234: vyākhyātaṃ karomy anya-pādaṃ yathājñānaṃ miśāmaya // Jss_1,2.26 //
GR14jnass01u:235: nārādhito yadi harir yena puṃsādhamena ca /
GR14jnass01u:236: kiṃ tasya tapasā vyarthaṃ niṣphalaṃ tat-pariśramaḥ // Jss_1,2.27 //
GR14jnass01u:237: vratāny eva hi dānāni tapāṃsy anaśanāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:238: vedopayuktā yajñāś ca karmāṇi ca śubhāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:239: na niṣpunāty abhaktaṃ ca surākumbham ivāpagā // Jss_1,2.28 //
GR14jnass01u:242: ślokārdhaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa kiṃcid eva yathāgamam /
GR14jnass01u:245: antar bahir yadi hair yeṣāṃ puṃsāṃ mahātmanāṃ // Jss_1,2.31 //
GR14jnass01u:246: svapne jāgaraṇe śaśvat tapas teṣāṃ ca niṣphalam /
GR14jnass01u:247: sa eva viṣṇu-tulyo hi tad-aṃśo bhārate mune // Jss_1,2.32 //
GR14jnass01u:250: datvā cakraṃ ca rakṣārthaṃ na niścinto janārdanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:251: svayaṃ tan nikaṭaṃ yāti draṣṭuṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // Jss_1,2.34 //
GR14jnass01u:252: tat-paro hi priyo nāsti kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:253: nahi bhaktāt paraś cātmā prāṇāś cāvayavādayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:254: na lakṣmī rādhikā vāṇī svayaṃbhuḥ śambhur eva ca // Jss_1,2.35 //
GR14jnass01u:255: bhakta-prāṇo hi kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-prāṇā hi vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:256: dhyāyante vaiṣṇavāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaś ca vaiṣṇavāṃs tathā // Jss_1,2.36 //
GR14jnass01u:257: vyākhyātam ca tri-pādaṃ ca he munīndra yathāgamam /
GR14jnass01u:259: nāntar bahir yadi harir yeṣāṃ puṃsāṃ ca nārada /
GR14jnass01u:260: teṣām api tapo vyartham antar-malina-cetasāṃ // Jss_1,2.38 //
GR14jnass01u:261: kiṃ taj-jñānena tapasā vratena niyamena ca /
GR14jnass01u:266: nityaṃ nityaṃ vidharmeṇa patitāḥ śvapacādhamāḥ // Jss_1,2.41 //
GR14jnass01u:268: nityaṃ te bhuñjate santas tan-naivedyaṃ pādodakam // Jss_1,2.42 //
GR14jnass01u:269: na datvā haraye yas tu yadi bhuṅkte dvijādhamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:270: annaṃ viṣṭhā-samaṃ mūtra-samaṃ toyaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Jss_1,2.43 //
GR14jnass01u:271: bhuṅkte sva-bhakṣyaṃ kolaś ca mlecchaś ca śvapacādhamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:272: vipro nityam abhakṣyaṃ ca bhuṅkte ca patitas tataḥ // Jss_1,2.44 //
GR14jnass01u:273: ślokam ekaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ yathā-jñānaṃ ca nārada /
GR14jnass01u:274: sannibodha parasyārdhaṃ vyākhyānaṃ ca yathocitaṃ // Jss_1,2.45 //
GR14jnass01u:275: tapaso virama brahman vyarthaṃ bhakta-tapo dhruvam /
GR14jnass01u:276: śaṅkaraś ca guruṃ kṛtvā hari-bhaktiṃ labhāciram // Jss_1,2.46 //
GR14jnass01u:278: gurur eva paraṃ brahma karṇa-dhāra-svarūpakaḥ // Jss_1,2.47 //
GR14jnass01u:279: ity evam uktvā tvāṃ devī prajagāma sarasvatī /
GR14jnass01u:280: vyākhyātas tad-abhiprāyaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te // Jss_1,2.48 //
GR14jnass01u:281: brahmāṇaś ca vacaḥ śrutvā jahāsa yogināṃ guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:282: sanat-kumāro bhagavān uvāca pitaraṃ śuka // Jss_1,2.49 //
GR14jnass01u:284: pūrva-ślokasya vyākhyānaṃ na buddhaṃ śiśunā mayā /
GR14jnass01u:285: putraṃ śiṣyam abodhaṃ ca yuktaṃ bodhayitum punaḥ // Jss_1,2.50 //
GR14jnass01u:286: ārādhito harir yena tasya vyarthaṃ tapo yadi /
GR14jnass01u:287: nārādhito hair yena tasya vyartaṃ tapo yadi // Jss_1,2.51 //
GR14jnass01u:288: tasyārahitau tau dvau tapasaś ca sthalaṃ kutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:289: tapaḥ kurvanti ye tāta tvaṃ māṃ bodhaya bālakam // Jss_1,2.52 //
GR14jnass01u:290: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sandigdho jagatāṃ guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:291: dadhyau kṛṣṇa-padāmbhojaṃ paraṃ kalpa-taruṃ śuka // Jss_1,2.53 //
GR14jnass01u:292: kṣaṇaṃ saṃcitya pādābjaṃ prāpa rāddhāntam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:293: vyākhyāṃ kartuṃ samārebhe vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,2.54 //
GR14jnass01u:295: brahmovāca dhanyo 'haṃ bhavataḥ putrāt jñānināṃ ca guror guroḥ /
GR14jnass01u:296: viṣṇu-bhaktāc ca dharmiṣṭhāt sat-putrāc ca pitā sukhī // Jss_1,2.55 //
GR14jnass01u:298: mamāpi saphalaṃ janma jīvanaṃ ca tvayā budha // Jss_1,2.56 //
GR14jnass01u:299: nibodha pūrva-ślokārthaṃ punar vyākhyāṃ karomi ca /
GR14jnass01u:300: tathāpi cen na santoṣo bhavān vyākhyāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,2.57 //
GR14jnass01u:302: saṃprāptaś ca harir yena vyarthas tasya tapaḥ-śramaḥ // Jss_1,2.58 //
GR14jnass01u:304: svapne jñāne ca jñātas teṣāṃ vyarthas tapaḥ-śramaḥ // Jss_1,2.59 //
GR14jnass01u:306: tīrthaṃ dānaṃ tāpaḥ puṇyaṃ vrataṃ naiva punāti tam // Jss_1,2.60 //
GR14jnass01u:307: yaś ca mūḍhatamo loke yaś ca bhaktiṃ parāṃ gataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:308: tāv ubhau sukha-sedhete tapaḥ kurvanti madhyamāḥ // Jss_1,2.61 //
GR14jnass01u:309: devān anyāṃś ca bhajate hariṃ jānāti tat-paraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:310: tapaḥ karoti taṃ prāptum ākāṅkṣan madhyamo janaḥ // Jss_1,2.62 //
GR14jnass01u:315: atīva mūḍho vipraś ca prāktanād guru-doṣataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:316: tāmaso hi na jānāti śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ tri-guṇāt param // Jss_1,2.65 //
GR14jnass01u:317: ajñānād atha vā jñānāt sat-saṅgād eva prāktanāt /
GR14jnass01u:318: bhuṅkte naivedyaṃ īśasya kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,2.66 //
GR14jnass01u:319: sa ca mukto bhavet putra mucyate sarva-pātakāt /
GR14jnass01u:320: sa yāti divya-yānena golokaṃ lokam uttamam // Jss_1,2.67 //
GR14jnass01u:322: atīva suśravaṃ cāru madhuraṃ muktidaṃ param // Jss_1,2.68 //
GR14jnass01u:324: devalo vṛṣa-vāhaś ca mahā-mūḍhaś ca pātakī // Jss_1,2.69 //
GR14jnass01u:325: svapne jñāne na jānāti puṇyaṃ vā kṛṣṇa-pūjanam /
GR14jnass01u:328: tena puṇyena naivedyaṃ lebhe kṛṣṇasya brāhmaṇaḥ // Jss_1,2.71 //
GR14jnass01u:329: pituḥ puṇyena putraś ca mārge patitam alpakam /
GR14jnass01u:330: svayaṃ bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ ca patitaṃ vaiṣṇavāj janāt // Jss_1,2.72 //
GR14jnass01u:332: gacchatas tatra viprasya patitaṃ bhakṣya-vastu ca // Jss_1,2.73 //
GR14jnass01u:336: viprocchiṣṭaṃ ca bubhuje tasya patnī pati-vratā // Jss_1,2.75 //
GR14jnass01u:338: jīvan-mukto brāhmaṇaś ca babhūva sa saputrakaḥ // Jss_1,2.76 //
GR14jnass01u:339: kālena tena puṇyena vyāghra-bhuktaś ca kānane /
GR14jnass01u:340: sārdhaṃ ca vyāghra-putrābhyāṃ golokaṃ prayayau dvija /
GR14jnass01u:341: pati-vratā saha-mṛtā bhartā sārdhaṃ jagāma sā // Jss_1,2.77 //
GR14jnass01u:345: sanat-kumāra uvāca aho tāta kim āścaryaṃ kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:346: paraṃ naivedya-māhātmyaṃ vistarād vada sāmpratam // Jss_1,3.1 //
GR14jnass01u:349: putreṇa sārdhaṃ prayayau bāndhavasya gṛhaṃ mudā // Jss_1,3.2 //
GR14jnass01u:351: bhuktvā pītvā ca tad-gṛhe sva-gṛhaṃ prayayau mudā // Jss_1,3.3 //
GR14jnass01u:353: dadarśa candra-bhāgāṃ tāṃ nadīm ati-manoharām // Jss_1,3.4 //
GR14jnass01u:354: uvāca putraḥ pitraṃ snātvā bhokṣyāmi ceti bhoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:355: kṣut-pipāsā balavatī vardhate tāta vartmani // Jss_1,3.5 //
GR14jnass01u:356: putrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tam uvāca dvijaḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:357: bhayaṃkaraṃ vanam idaṃ samīpe saritaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,3.6 //
GR14jnass01u:359: tatra snātvā ca bhokṣyāvo gaccha vatsa yathāsukham // Jss_1,3.7 //
GR14jnass01u:360: tātasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jahāsa ca cukopa ha /
GR14jnass01u:362: śiśur uvāca bālo 'haṃ daśa-varṣīyas tvaṃ ca vṛddhaś ca jñānadaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:363: pitā dadāti putrāya jñānaṃ sarvatra bhū-tale // Jss_1,3.9 //
GR14jnass01u:364: aho duratyayaḥ kālo vṛdhho vadati bālavat /
GR14jnass01u:365: kathaṃ prāktanam ullaṅghya brūhi tāta duratyayam // Jss_1,3.10 //
GR14jnass01u:366: prāktanāt sukha-duḥkhaṃ ca rogaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ pitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:367: sumṛtyur apamṛtyur vā cirāyur alpa-jīvanaḥ // Jss_1,3.11 //
GR14jnass01u:368: yatra kāle ca yan-mṛtyur bhavanaṃ śubha-karma ca /
GR14jnass01u:369: nyūnādhikaṃ kṣaṇaṃ nāsti niṣekaḥ kena vāryate // Jss_1,3.12 //
GR14jnass01u:370: yasya haste ca yan-mṛtyur vidhātrā likhitaḥ purā /
GR14jnass01u:371: na ca taṃ khaṇḍituṃ śaktaḥ svayaṃ viṣṇuś ca śaṅkaraḥ // Jss_1,3.13 //
GR14jnass01u:372: tāta vyartham adhītaṃ te durbuddher janma niṣphalam /
GR14jnass01u:373: subuddheḥ saphalaṃ janma tat-kṣaṇam jīvanaṃ sukham // Jss_1,3.14 //
GR14jnass01u:374: yena śuklī-kṛtā haṃsāḥ śukāś ca haritī-kṛtāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:375: mayūrāś citritā yena sa me rakṣāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,3.15 //
GR14jnass01u:376: yena kṛṣṇena viśvāni cāsaṃkhyāni kṛtāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:377: carācaraṃ ca yo rakṣet sa me rakṣāṃ kariṣyati // Jss_1,3.16 //
GR14jnass01u:378: ghorāraṇye sukhaṃ śete yo hi kṛṣṇena rakṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:379: nirbandho 'pi yasya maraṇaṃ tasya mandire // Jss_1,3.17 //
GR14jnass01u:381: yo nāga-bhakṣito bhogāt sa bhṛto garuḍāntike // Jss_1,3.18 //
GR14jnass01u:382: na samudre ca mriyate nāgni-rāśau viṣānale /
GR14jnass01u:383: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇāyur-marmāṇi rakṣati // Jss_1,3.19 //
GR14jnass01u:385: tṛṇāgreṇāpi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ prāpta-kālo na jīvati // Jss_1,3.20 //
GR14jnass01u:386: kaścid garbhe ca mriyate kaścid bhūmiṣṭa-mātrataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:387: kaścid yauvana-kāle ca kaścid eva hi vārddhake // Jss_1,3.21 //
GR14jnass01u:388: kaścid cirāyu rogī cāpy arogī cāpi kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:389: kaścid dhanī daridraś ca kaścid eva hi karmaṇā // Jss_1,3.22 //
GR14jnass01u:390: kaścit kalpānta-jīvī ca cira-jīvī ca kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:391: prāktanād amaraḥ kaścin niṣeko balavattaraḥ // Jss_1,3.23 //
GR14jnass01u:392: kaścid yāti ca rājendro divya-yānena karmaṇā /
GR14jnass01u:394: kaścid eva hi sannyāsī kaścic ca nara-ghātakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:395: kaścid gajendra-gāmī ca paśu-yāyī ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.25 //
GR14jnass01u:396: kaścid sūkṣmāṃśukā-dhārī kaścij jīrṇa-paṭī janaḥ // Jss_1,3.26 //
GR14jnass01u:397: kaścin nagno 'apy anāhārī sudhā-bhojī ca ca kaścana /
GR14jnass01u:398: kaścic ca sundaraḥ śrīmān galat-kuṣṭī ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.27 //
GR14jnass01u:399: kaścit kubjaś cāṅga-hīno badhiraḥ kāṇa eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:400: kaścid dīrgho madhyamaś ca kaścit khañjaś ca vāmanaḥ // Jss_1,3.28 //
GR14jnass01u:401: kaścit kṛṣṇaś ca gauraś ca śyāmalaś ca sva-karmaṇā /
GR14jnass01u:402: kaścid bhaktyā ca prāpnoti kṛṣṇa-dāsyaṃ sudurlabham // Jss_1,3.29 //
GR14jnass01u:404: kaścit prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma-lokaṃ nirāmayam // Jss_1,3.30 //
GR14jnass01u:406: kaścit vargam indra-lokaṃ yama-lokaṃ ca kaścana // Jss_1,3.31 //
GR14jnass01u:407: kaścic ca narake ghore prāpnoti kleśam ulvaṇam /
GR14jnass01u:408: tādito yama-dūtena kṣudhitas tṛṣitaḥ sadā // Jss_1,3.32 //
GR14jnass01u:409: bhuṅkte viṇ-mūtra-kīṭaṃ tan-malaṃ śleṣmaṃ garaṃ vasām /
GR14jnass01u:410: kṣura-dhāre tapta-taile vahnau śite jale sthale // Jss_1,3.33 //
GR14jnass01u:411: prāpnoti dāruṇaṃ duḥkham ākalpaṃ pātakī pitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:412: tathā bhogāvaśeṣe ca labdhā janma sva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,3.34 //
GR14jnass01u:414: yad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati yad-bhayāt // Jss_1,3.35 //
GR14jnass01u:415: varṣatīndro dahaty agnir mṛtyuś carati jantuṣu /
GR14jnass01u:416: yasyājñayā sṛṣṭi-vidhau mūrmo 'nantaṃ dadhāti ca // Jss_1,3.36 //
GR14jnass01u:417: sa ca sarvaṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ līlayā ceśvarecchayā /
GR14jnass01u:419: dharā sā sarvasyādyā ratnavāṃś ca himālayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:420: svayaṃ vidhātā bhagavān dhyāyate yam ahar-niśam // Jss_1,3.38 //
GR14jnass01u:421: yaṃ dhyāyate ca bhajate svayaṃ mṛtuñjayaḥ śivaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:422: sahasra-vaktro 'yaṃ stauti dhyāyate bhajate sadā // Jss_1,3.39 //
GR14jnass01u:423: svayṃ sarasvatī stauti yam īśvaram abhīpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:424: sevate pāda-padmaṃ ca svayaṃ padmālayā pitaḥ // Jss_1,3.40 //
GR14jnass01u:425: māyā bhītā ca yaṃ stauti durgā durgati-nāśinī /
GR14jnass01u:426: stuvanti vedāḥ satataṃ sāvitrī veda-mātṛkā // Jss_1,3.41 //
GR14jnass01u:427: siddhendrāś ca munīndrāś ca yogīndrāḥ sanakādayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:428: rājendrāś cāsurendrāś ca surendrā manavas tathā // Jss_1,3.42 //
GR14jnass01u:429: dhyāyante ca bhajante ca bhaktāḥ santo hi santatam /
GR14jnass01u:430: kecid vidanti yaṃ brahmāṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,3.43 //
GR14jnass01u:431: kecit pradhānaṃ sarvādyaṃ kecic ca jyotir īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:432: kecic ca sarva-rūpaṃ ca sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam // Jss_1,3.44 //
GR14jnass01u:436: bhaja tāta paraṃ brahma smara śaśvat sureśvaram // Jss_1,3.46 //
GR14jnass01u:438: snātvā papau jalaṃ svacchaṃ bubhuje miṣṭa-modakam // Jss_1,3.47 //
GR14jnass01u:439: pitā tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā sānandāśru mumoca saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:441: pitā snātvā samārebhe sandhyāṃ kartuṃ ca pūjanam /
GR14jnass01u:442: susnātaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraḥ sa prayayau vanam // Jss_1,3.49 //
GR14jnass01u:444: cakāra cayanaṃ tūrṇaṃ praśastaṃ patra-pañcakam // Jss_1,3.50 //
GR14jnass01u:445: sundaraṃ kusumaṃ vanyaṃ pūjanārthaṃ pitus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:446: dadarśa purato bālaḥ supakvaṃ vadarī-phalam // Jss_1,3.51 //
GR14jnass01u:447: cakāra cayanaṃ tāni phalāni śobhanāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:448: dhātrī-phalaṃ supakvaṃ ca pakvam āmrātakaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.52 //
GR14jnass01u:449: supakvaṃ ca kadambaṃ ca cakāra cayanaṃ punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:450: supakvaṃ sundaraṃ ramyaṃ dāḍimaṃ śrī-phalaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.53 //
GR14jnass01u:452: karañjakaṃ ca jāmbīraṃ sundaraṃ cikuraṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.54 //
GR14jnass01u:453: tat sarvaṃ cayanaṃ kṛtvā dadarśa purataḥ saraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:454: sunirmalaṃ jalaṃ svacchaṃ śveta-padmaṃ manoharam // Jss_1,3.55 //
GR14jnass01u:456: vihāya tāni sarvāṇi saraḥ-śirasi susthale // Jss_1,3.56 //
GR14jnass01u:458: kiṃcit surakta-kahlāraṃ pakvaṃ padma-phalaṃ tathā // Jss_1,3.57 //
GR14jnass01u:459: sarvam āharaṇaṃ kṛtvā pitaraṃ gantum udyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:463: cakāra cayanaṃ sphītaḥ puṣpāṇi sundarāṇi ca /
GR14jnass01u:464: puṣpeṇa phala-patreṇa tasya bhāro babhūva ha // Jss_1,3.60 //
GR14jnass01u:465: bālo voḍhum aśakyantaś ca yayau gamana-mantharaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:466: na phalaṃ bubhuje so 'pi dharmādharma-bhayena ca // Jss_1,3.61 //
GR14jnass01u:467: puro dadarśa sa śiśur ghoraṃ vyāghrālayaṃ bhiyā /
GR14jnass01u:468: tāta tāteti śabdaṃ ca cakāra ha punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,3.62 //
GR14jnass01u:469: na dadarśa ca tātaṃ ca śārdulaṃ ca dadarśa saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:471: hariṃ nara-hariṃ rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca mādhvam /
GR14jnass01u:473: etāni daśa nāmāni japan vipra-śiśur bhiyā /
GR14jnass01u:474: prayayau purataḥ śīghraṃ punar eva sarovaram // Jss_1,3.65 //
GR14jnass01u:475: saraso nirmale tīre puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:476: dadau bhaktyā bhagavate kṛṣṇāya paramātmane // Jss_1,3.66 //
GR14jnass01u:478: nikaṭaṃ na yayau vyāghro dṛṣṭvā bālaṃ ca dūrataḥ // Jss_1,3.67 //
GR14jnass01u:479: vyāghraṃ dadarśa bālaś ca prakaṭāsyaṃ bhayānakam /
GR14jnass01u:481: dṛṣṭvā ca durato vyāghram uvāsa sarasas taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:484: viśuddhaṃ ca tathājñākhyaṃ ṣaṭ-cakraṃ ca vibhāvya ca // Jss_1,3.70 //
GR14jnass01u:504: nirliptaṃ sākṣi-bhūtaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,3.80 //
GR14jnass01u:506: puruṣaṃ paramātmaikaṃ pareśaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,3.81 //
GR14jnass01u:507: evaṃ bhūtaṃ vibhuṃ dṛṣṭvā manasā praṇanāma tam /
GR14jnass01u:508: tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā tam īśaṃ sampuṭāñjaliḥ // Jss_1,3.82 //
GR14jnass01u:509: śrī-subhadra uvāca he nātha darśnaṃ dehi māṃ bhaktaṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GR14jnass01u:510: śrīda śrīśa śrī-nivāsa śrī-nidhe śrī-niketana // Jss_1,3.83 //
GR14jnass01u:517: ity evam uktvā sa śiśu ruroda ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:518: dhyāyena tat-padāmbhojaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca cakāra saḥ // Jss_1,3.87 //
GR14jnass01u:519: iti viprakṛtaṃ stotraṃ tri-sandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:520: mucyate sarva-pāpebhyo viṣṇu-lokaṃ sa gacchati // Jss_1,3.88 //
GR14jnass01u:524: brahmovāca brāhmaṇasya stavaṃ śrutvā parituṣṭo janārdanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:525: kṛpāṃ cakāra bhagavān bhakteśo bhakta-vatsalaḥ // Jss_1,4.1 //
GR14jnass01u:535: śubhāśiṣaṃ dadau tasmai datvā śirasi hastakam // Jss_1,4.6 //
GR14jnass01u:538: śrī-nārāyaṇarṣir uvāca aye vipra mahā-bhāga saphalaṃ jīvanaṃ tava /
GR14jnass01u:539: yasmin kule ca jāto 'si tad-dhanyaṃ supraśaṃsitam // Jss_1,4.8 //
GR14jnass01u:541: dhruvaṃ yāsyasi golokaṃ paramānandam īpsitam // Jss_1,4.9 //
GR14jnass01u:542: tat kulaṃ pāvanaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca nirāpadam /
GR14jnass01u:543: yasmin svayaṃ bhavān jātaḥ puṇyaḥ kṛṣṇa-parāyaṇaḥ // Jss_1,4.10 //
GR14jnass01u:545: bhuktvā tavaiṣā buddhiś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktir babhūva ca // Jss_1,4.11 //
GR14jnass01u:547: yad vaktuṃ na hi śaktāś ca vedāś catvāra eva ca // Jss_1,4.12 //
GR14jnass01u:548: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva bhadraṃ te subhadra dvija-puṅgava /
GR14jnass01u:549: sarvaṃ dātum ahaṃ śakto yat te manasi vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.13 //
GR14jnass01u:550: nārāyaṇa-vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca śiṣuḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:552: subhadra uvāca dehi me kṛṣṇa-pādābje dṛḍhaṃ bhaktiṃ sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:553: tad-dāsyaṃ tat-pade vāsaṃ jarā-mṛtyu-haraṃ param // Jss_1,4.15 //
GR14jnass01u:554: anyaṃ varaṃ na gṛhṇāmi na me kiṃcit prayojanam /
GR14jnass01u:555: nāhaṃ varārthī kāmī ca rāgī vetana-bhug yathā // Jss_1,4.16 //
GR14jnass01u:556: nārāyaṇarṣir uvāca śrī-kṛṣṇo yasya bhaktiś ca tasyātra kiṃ sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:558: nirvikalpo dadāty asya naiva gṛhṇāti vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:559: animittāṃ harer bhaktiṃ bhaktā vāñcchanti santatam // Jss_1,4.18 //
GR14jnass01u:560: gṛhāṇa mantraṃ kṛṣṇasya paraṃ kalpa-taruṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:564: ity evam uktvā tat-karṇe kathayām āsa dakṣiṇe /
GR14jnass01u:567: ājñāṃ cakāra sa ṛṣis tad eva paṭhituṃ mudā // Jss_1,4.22 //
GR14jnass01u:570: harer dāsyaṃ ca tad-bhaktir goloka-vāsam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:572: subhadra uvāca satyaṃ kuru mahā-bhāga varaṃ me yadi dāsyasi /
GR14jnass01u:573: varaṃ vṛṇomi tat paścāt yan me manasi vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.25 //
GR14jnass01u:574: nārāyaṇarṣir uvāca oṃ satyaṃ vatsa dāsyāmi varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam /
GR14jnass01u:575: mamāśakyaṃ nāsti kiṃcit dātāhaṃ sarva-sampadām // Jss_1,4.26 //
GR14jnass01u:576: subhadra uvāca kaṇṭhe te kiṃ ca kavacaṃ kasya vā sarva-pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:578: kavacaṃ dehi me deva sva-satya-rakṣaṇaṃ kuru /
GR14jnass01u:580: vaktuṃ na śaktas tad vākyaṃ dadhyau kṛṣṇa-padāmbujam /
GR14jnass01u:581: pradadau guṭikāṃ tasmai novāca kavacaṃ muniḥ // Jss_1,4.29 //
GR14jnass01u:582: tam uvāca maharṣiś ca vituṣṭaś conmanāḥ suta /
GR14jnass01u:583: vatsa krodho hi devasya varaṃ tulyaṃ ca vāñcchitam // Jss_1,4.30 //
GR14jnass01u:584: nārāyaṇarṣir uvāca triṃṣat-sahasra-varṣaṃ ca bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:585: labhasva durlabhāṃ lakṣmīṃ māyayā mohito bhava // Jss_1,4.31 //
GR14jnass01u:589: pare mṛkaṇḍu-putras tvaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo bhaviṣyasi // Jss_1,4.33 //
GR14jnass01u:590: mayā dattaṃ ca kavacaṃ tvāṃ ca rakṣati putraka /
GR14jnass01u:591: tava kaṇṭhe sthitiś cāśya prati janmani janmani // Jss_1,4.34 //
GR14jnass01u:592: punaś ca guṭikā-yuktaṃ kṛtvā ca kavacaṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:593: gale dadhāra bhaktyā ca tad-bhakto dharma-nandanaḥ // Jss_1,4.35 //
GR14jnass01u:594: varaṃ datvā ca sa munir yayau gehaṃ sa unmanāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:595: viprāya kavacaṃ datvā naṣṭa-vatsā gaur yathā // Jss_1,4.36 //
GR14jnass01u:596: bhrātrā nareṇa pitrā ca dharmeṇa ca mahātmanā /
GR14jnass01u:597: mātrā mūrtyā ca patnyā ca śāntyā ca bhartsito muniḥ // Jss_1,4.37 //
GR14jnass01u:598: vipraḥ samprāpya kavacaṃ mantraṃ kalpa-taruṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:601: jajāpa paramaṃ mantraṃ sampūjya jagad-īśvaram // Jss_1,4.39 //
GR14jnass01u:602: atha tat-tāta-vipro hi samanviṣya sutaṃ ciram /
GR14jnass01u:603: gatvā ca sva-gṛhaṃ duḥkhī śokārtaḥ sa ruroda ca // Jss_1,4.40 //
GR14jnass01u:605: na tatyāja tanuṃ vipro dṛṣṭvā susvapnam uttamam // Jss_1,4.41 //
GR14jnass01u:607: prayayau kānanaṃ ghoraṃ sarvaiś ca bāndhavaiḥ sahaḥ // Jss_1,4.42 //
GR14jnass01u:608: sarvaṃ vanaṃ samanviṣya prayayus te sarovaram /
GR14jnass01u:609: dadṛśus te śiśuṃ gṛhyaṃ sūryābhaṃ vaṭa-mūlake // Jss_1,4.43 //
GR14jnass01u:610: cucumba gaṇḍaṃ putrasya vipro viprā ca sāradam /
GR14jnass01u:611: āśiśleṣa krameṇaiva mātā tātaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,4.44 //
GR14jnass01u:612: putraś ca sarva-vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsa sādaram /
GR14jnass01u:613: śrutvā putrasya vipraś ca viprā bāndhavas tathā // Jss_1,4. 45 //
GR14jnass01u:615: candra-bhāgāṃ samuttīrya viveśa nagaraṃ param // Jss_1,4.46 //
GR14jnass01u:616: nagara-stho nṛpendraś ca dṛṣṭvā tejasvinaṃ śiśum /
GR14jnass01u:617: dadau tasmai sva-kanyāṃ ca ratnālaṅkāra-bhūṣitam // Jss_1,4.47 //
GR14jnass01u:620: gajendrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ ca pradadau yautukaṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:621: aśvānāṃ daśa-lakṣaṃ ca ratnānāṃ ca sahasrakam // Jss_1,4.49 //
GR14jnass01u:624: dāsānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca padātīnāṃ tri-lakṣakam /
GR14jnass01u:625: daśa-lakṣaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca ratna-mālāṃ sudurlabhām // Jss_1,4.51 //
GR14jnass01u:626: datvā tasmai ca kanyāṃ ca ruroda ca sabhāryakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:627: rājā ca kanyayā sārdhaṃ prayayau vipra-mandiram // Jss_1,4.52 //
GR14jnass01u:628: gatvā cāpi kiyad dūraṃ dadarśa nagaraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:629: atīva sundaraṃ ramyaṃ vijitya cāmarāvatīm // Jss_1,4.53 //
GR14jnass01u:633: durlaṅghyam ati-durgamyaṃ ripūṇām api putraka // Jss_1,4.55 //
GR14jnass01u:639: prākāraṃ maṇi-bhūṣāḍhyam uccair ākāśa-sparśi ca // Jss_1,4.58 //
GR14jnass01u:640: jagāma vismayaṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā nagaram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:641: pitrā mātrā saha śiśur vismayaṃ ca yayau mudā // Jss_1,4.59 //
GR14jnass01u:643: catur-guṇaṃ padātīnām āyayus te 'py anuvrajam // Jss_1,4.60 //
GR14jnass01u:644: vāraṇendraṃ puras kṛtya veśyāṃ ca nartakaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:645: dvijāṃś ca pūrṇa-kumbhāṃś ca pati-putravatīṃ satīṃ // Jss_1,4.61 //
GR14jnass01u:647: mūrdhnā nanāma vegenāpy avaruhya gajād api // Jss_1,4.62 //
GR14jnass01u:649: ratna-siṃhāsanaṃ tasmai pradadau sādaraṃ mudā // Jss_1,4.63 //
GR14jnass01u:650: kanyā-dātre ca pitre ca mātre ca sādaraṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:651: ratna-siṃḥāsanaṃ ramyaṃ pradadau pātra eva ca // Jss_1,4.64 //
GR14jnass01u:652: śiśum siṣeva pātraś ca svayaṃ ca śveta-cāmaraiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:654: uvāsa sa sa-bhāryāṃ ca sudharmyāṃ mahendravat /
GR14jnass01u:655: śvasuraś ca yayau gehaṃ śiśunā ca puraskṛtaḥ // Jss_1,4.66 //
GR14jnass01u:656: triṃśat-sahasra-varṣaṃ ca rājā rājyaṃ cakāra saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:657: kālāntare tat-pitā ca vane vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ // Jss_1,4.67 //
GR14jnass01u:661: tad-asthi bhuktvā vyāghraś ca pūtaḥ sadyaś ca sāṃpratam // Jss_1,4.69 //
GR14jnass01u:662: tābhyāṃ sārdhaṃ ca prayayau golokaṃ sumanoharam /
GR14jnass01u:663: śiśur dehaṃ parityajya himādrau svar-ṇadī-taṭe // Jss_1,4.70 //
GR14jnass01u:664: datvā putrāya rājyaṃ ca svargād api sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:665: mṛkaṇḍu-patnī-garbhe ca lebhe janma sva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,4.71 //
GR14jnass01u:669: śva-bhakṣitaṃ ca naivedyaṃ bhuktvā ced īdṛśī gatiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:670: akāmataś cāpy ajñāto jīrṇa-mārga-sthitaṃ suta // Jss_1,4.73 //
GR14jnass01u:671: yo bhakṣet kāmato jñāto nityaṃ naivedyam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:672: na jānanti gatis tasya vedāś catvāra eva ca // Jss_1,4.74 //
GR14jnass01u:673: iti te kathitaṃ brahmann itihāsaṃ purātanam /
GR14jnass01u:674: āścaryaṃ madhuraṃ ramyaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // Jss_1,4.75 //
GR14jnass01u:675: śrī-nārada uvāca śrutaṃ naivedya-māhātmyam atīva sumanoharam /
GR14jnass01u:676: īśvarasyāpi he tāta kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.76 //
GR14jnass01u:678: nārāyaṇarṣer kaṇṭhe ca kavacaṃ tasya tad vada // Jss_1,4.77 //
GR14jnass01u:680: sanat-kumāra uvāca mamāpy astīti sandeho vacane prapitāmaha /
GR14jnass01u:681: kasya tat kavacaṃ brahmann idaṃ vaktuṃ tvam arhasi // Jss_1,4.78 //
GR14jnass01u:682: sa pitā sa guruḥ svacchaḥ karoti bhrama-bhañjanam /
GR14jnass01u:683: śīghraṃ brūhi mahā-bhāga nāradaṃ māṃ suta-priya // Jss_1,4.79 //
GR14jnass01u:685: uvāca vacanaṃ brahmā smaran kṛṣṇa-padāmbujam // Jss_1,4.80 //
GR14jnass01u:687: viprāya kavacaṃ dattam dhyānaṃ ca parmātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.81 //
GR14jnass01u:688: tad bravīmi mahā-bhāga tvām eva nāradaṃ prati /
GR14jnass01u:689: kaṇṭha-sthaṃ kavacaṃ vaktuṃ naiva śaknomi sāṃpratam // Jss_1,4.82 //
GR14jnass01u:691: nārāyaṇarṣi-kaṇṭhe ca tad eva paramādbhutam // Jss_1,4.83 //
GR14jnass01u:692: tad eva dharma-kaṇṭhe ca narasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:693: agastyasya ca kaṇṭhe ca lomaśasya mahā-muneḥ // Jss_1,4.84 //
GR14jnass01u:694: tulasyāś cāpi saṃjñāyāḥ sāvitryāś cāpi putraka /
GR14jnass01u:695: anyeṣāṃ ca bhāgyavatāṃ bhārate ca sudurlabhe // Jss_1,4.85 //
GR14jnass01u:696: nārada uvāca paścāt śroṣyāmi kavacaṃ jagan-maṅgala-maṅgalam /
GR14jnass01u:697: dhyānaṃ pūjāṃ vidhānaṃ ca kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,4.86 //
GR14jnass01u:698: ādau kathaya bhadraṃ te paraṃ parama-bhadrakam /
GR14jnass01u:699: subhadra-prāptaṃ kavacaṃ māhātmyaṃ yasya durlabham // Jss_1,4.87 //
GR14jnass01u:702: śaṅkarasya mukhād vipra sva-guror jñāninas tathā // Jss_1,4.88 //
GR14jnass01u:706: śrī-sanat-kumāra uvāca tavecchā yatra kavace dhyāne tad vada sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:707: yac chṛṇomi śubhaṃ tac ca kena śreyasi tṛpyate // Jss_1,5.1 //
GR14jnass01u:708: bramovāca dhyānaṃ sāma-vedoktaṃ dattam nārāyaṇena vai /
GR14jnass01u:709: kavacaṃ ca subhadrāya dharmiṣṭhāya mahātmane // Jss_1,5.2 //
GR14jnass01u:715: sarvādyaṃ sarva-jñaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,5.5 //
GR14jnass01u:716: nirguṇaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca nirliptam īsvaraṃ bhaje /
GR14jnass01u:717: dhyātvā mūlena tasmai ca dadyāt pādyādikaṃ mudā // Jss_1,5.6 //
GR14jnass01u:718: tataḥ stotraṃ ca kavacaṃ bhaktyā ca prapaṭhen naraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:719: japtvā ca mantraṃ bhaktyā daṇḍavat praṇamed bhuvi /
GR14jnass01u:720: iti te kathitaṃ vatsa kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // Jss_1,5.7 //
GR14jnass01u:721: śrī-sanatkumāra uvāca brūhi me kavacaṃ brahman jagan-maṅgala-maṅgalam /
GR14jnass01u:722: pūjyaṃ puṇya-svarūpaṃ ca kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,5.8 //
GR14jnass01u:724: brahmovāca śṛṇu vakṣyāmi viprendra kavacaṃ paramādbhutaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:725: śrī-kṛṣṇenaiva kathitaṃ mahyaṃ ca kṛpayā parā // Jss_1,5.9 //
GR14jnass01u:726: mayā dattaṃ ca dharmāya tena nārāyaṇarṣaye /
GR14jnass01u:727: ṛṣiṇā tena tad dattaṃ subhadrāya mahātmane // Jss_1,5.10 //
GR14jnass01u:728: ati-guhyatamaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ snehād vadāmy aham /
GR14jnass01u:729: yad dhṛtvā paṭhanāt siddhāḥ siddhāni prāpnuvanti ca // Jss_1,5.11 //
GR14jnass01u:731: ṛṣiś chandaś ca sāvitrī devo nārāyaṇaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.12 //
GR14jnass01u:733: rādheśo me śiraḥ pātu kaṇṭhaṃ radheśvaraḥ // Jss_1,5.13 //
GR14jnass01u:734: gopīśaś cakṣuṣī pātu tālu ca bhagavān svayam /
GR14jnass01u:735: gaṇḍa-yugmaṃ ca govindaḥ karṇa-yugmaṃ ca keśavaḥ // Jss_1,5.14 //
GR14jnass01u:736: galaṃ gadādharaḥ pātu skandhaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GR14jnass01u:737: vakṣa-sthalaṃ vāsudevaś codaraṃ cāpi so 'cyutaḥ // Jss_1,5.15 //
GR14jnass01u:739: puruṣottamaḥ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ nityānando nitambakam // Jss_1,5.16 //
GR14jnass01u:741: nāsāṃ ca nakharaṃ pātu narasiṃhaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ // Jss_1,5.17 //
GR14jnass01u:743: prācyāṃ pātu ca rāmaś ca vahnau ca vaṃśī-dharaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.18 //
GR14jnass01u:744: pātu dāmodaro dakṣe nairṛte ca narottmaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:745: paścime puṇḍarīkākṣo vāyavyāṃ vāmanaḥ svayam // Jss_1,5.19 //
GR14jnass01u:746: anantaś cottare pātu aiśānyām īśvaraḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:747: jale sthale cāntarīkṣe svapne jāgaraṇe tathā // Jss_1,5.20 //
GR14jnass01u:748: pātu vṛndāvaneśaś ca māṃ bhaktaṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GR14jnass01u:749: iti te kathitaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ paramādbhutam // Jss_1,5.21 //
GR14jnass01u:751: idaṃ kavacam iṣṭaṃ ca pūjā-kāle ca yaḥ paṭhet // Jss_1,5.22 //
GR14jnass01u:753: ihaiva hari-bhaktiṃ ca jīvan-mukto bhaven naraḥ // Jss_1,5.23 //
GR14jnass01u:754: nārada uvāca nārāyaṇarṣiṇā dattaṃ kavacaṃ yat sudurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:755: subhadrāya brāhmaṇāya tan me vaktum ihārhasi // Jss_1,5.24 //
GR14jnass01u:757: mad-iṣṭa-devyāḥ kavacaṃ kathaṃ tat kathayāmi te /
GR14jnass01u:760: tathāpīdaṃ na kathitaṃ niṣiddhaṃ hariṇā smṛtam // Jss_1,5.26 //
GR14jnass01u:761: tasyarṣeś ceṣṭa-devyāś ca noktaṃ tenedam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:762: mahyaṃ na dattā guṭikā bāndhavair bhartsitena ca // Jss_1,5.27 //
GR14jnass01u:763: ātmanaḥ kavacaṃ mantraṃ svayaṃ dātuṃ na cārhati /
GR14jnass01u:764: prāṇā naṣṭāś ca dānena ceti veda-vido viduḥ // Jss_1,5.28 //
GR14jnass01u:766: sa eva tubhyaṃ kavacaṃ dāsyasy eva na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,5.29 //
GR14jnass01u:768: dhruvaṃ prāpsyasi tvaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ tat sudurlabham // Jss_1,5.30 //
GR14jnass01u:769: kumāra gaccha vaikuṇṭhaṃ sva-guruṃ paśya sat-varam /
GR14jnass01u:770: nārāyaṇaś ca kavacaṃ tubhyaṃ dāsyasi niścitam // Jss_1,5.31 //
GR14jnass01u:772: saṃprāpya kavacaṃ vatsa kavacaṃ tat sudurlabham // Jss_1,5.32 //
GR14jnass01u:773: ājñayā brahmaṇaś cāpi nārado gantum udyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:780: gate brahman kiṃ cakāra bhagavān nārado muniḥ // Jss_1,6.1 //
GR14jnass01u:781: vyāso uvāca munis tayoś ca gatayoḥ sa ruroda sarit-taṭe /
GR14jnass01u:782: itas tataś ca babhrāma mad-viyoga-śucāspada // Jss_1,6.2 //
GR14jnass01u:784: dhyāyamāno hari-padaṃ śivaṃ draṣṭuṃ samutsukaḥ // Jss_1,6.3 //
GR14jnass01u:785: praṇamya pitaraṃ bhaktyā kumāraṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:788: bhuktvā phalaṃ jalaṃ pītvā prayayau gandha-mādanam // Jss_1,6.5 //
GR14jnass01u:796: śivasya śiṣyaṃ sad-bhaktaṃ yogīndrāṇāṃ guror guroḥ // Jss_1,6.9 //
GR14jnass01u:803: itas tataś ca babhrāma dadarśa svāśramaṃ muneḥ /
GR14jnass01u:804: atīva surahaḥ-sthānaṃ ramyaṃ ramyaṃ navaṃ navam // Jss_1,6.13 //
GR14jnass01u:805: susnigdhaṃ sundaraṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ svacchaṃ sarovaram /
GR14jnass01u:808: vyākulaiḥ saṃkulaiḥ śaśvad-rājitaiś ca virājitam // Jss_1,6.15 //
GR14jnass01u:810: karañjakaiś ca karajair bimbaiḥ śākhoṭikais tathā // Jss_1,6.16 //
GR14jnass01u:812: mandāraiḥ sindhu-vāraiś ca tāḍi-patraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ // Jss_1,6.17 //
GR14jnass01u:813: guvākair nāriketaiś ca kharjuraiḥ panasais tathā /
GR14jnass01u:814: tālaiḥ śālaiḥ piyālaiś ca hintālair vakulair api // Jss_1,6.18 //
GR14jnass01u:815: āmrair āmrātakaiś caiva jambīrair dāḍimais tathā /
GR14jnass01u:816: śrī-phalair vadarībhiś ca jambubhir nāgaraṅgakaiḥ // Jss_1,6.19 //
GR14jnass01u:818: taruṇais taru-rājais ca nānā-jātibhir īpsitam // Jss_1,6.20 //
GR14jnass01u:821: kadambānāṃ kadambaiś ca svacchaiḥ śvetaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:822: nāgeśvarāṇāṃ vṛndaiś ca dīptaṃ mandārakair varaiḥ // Jss_1,6.22 //
GR14jnass01u:824: santataṃ kūjitaṃ śuddhaṃ suvyaktaṃ sumanoharam // Jss_1,6.23 //
GR14jnass01u:825: śārdūlaiḥ śarabhaiḥ siṃhair gaṇḍakair mahiṣaiḥ param /
GR14jnass01u:830: siddha-sthalaṃ siddhidaṃ taṃ mantra-siddhi-karaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,6.26 //
GR14jnass01u:832: āsane ca samāsīnaṃ dhyāna-hīnaṃ dadarśa tam // Jss_1,6.27 //
GR14jnass01u:834: datvāmalaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ saṃbhāṣāṃ sa cakāra ha // Jss_1,6.28 //
GR14jnass01u:838: atithiṃ brāhmaṇa-varaṃ brahma-putraṃ ca pūjitaṃ // Jss_1,6.30 //
GR14jnass01u:839: munir uvāca kiṃ nāma bhavato vipra kva yāsīti kva cāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:840: kva te pitā sa ko vāpi kva vāsaḥ kutra saṃbhavaḥ // Jss_1,6.31 //
GR14jnass01u:841: māṃ vā mamāśramaṃ vāpi pūtaṃ kartum ihāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:842: mūrtimad-brahma-tejo hi mama bhāgyād upasthitaḥ // Jss_1,6.32 //
GR14jnass01u:844: na hy ammayāni tīrthāni na devā mṛcchitāmayāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:845: te punanty urukālena vaiṣṇavo darśanena ca // Jss_1,6.33 //
GR14jnass01u:846: sadyaḥ pūtāni tīrthāni sadyaḥ pūtā sa-sāgarā /
GR14jnass01u:850: pūjito vaiṣṇavo yena viśvaṃ ca tena pūjitam /
GR14jnass01u:851: āśramaṃ vastu-sahitaṃ sarvaṃ tubhyaṃ niveditam // Jss_1,6.36 //
GR14jnass01u:852: phalāni ca supakvāni bhuṅkṣva bhogāni sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:853: suvāsitam piba svādu śītalaṃ nirmalaṃ jalam // Jss_1,6.37 //
GR14jnass01u:854: dugdhaṃ ca surabhī-dattaṃ ramyaṃ madhuritaṃ madhu /
GR14jnass01u:855: paripakvaṃ phala-rasaṃ piba svādu muhur muhuḥ // Jss_1,6.38 //
GR14jnass01u:856: sukha-bījye sutalpe ca śayanaṃ kuru sundare /
GR14jnass01u:859: atithir yasya puṣṭo hi tasya puṣṭo hariḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:860: harau tuṣṭe gurus tuṣṭo gurau tuṣṭe jagat-trayam // Jss_1,6.40 //
GR14jnass01u:862: tīrthāny etāni sarvāṇi puṇyāni ca vratāni ca // Jss_1,6.41 //
GR14jnass01u:863: tapāṃsi yajñāḥ satyaṃ ca śīlaṃ dharmaḥ sukarma ca /
GR14jnass01u:864: apūjitair atithibhir sārdhaṃ sarve prayānti te // Jss_1,6.42 //
GR14jnass01u:865: athātithi-vimukhe doṣāḥ atithir yasya bhagnāśo gṛhāt pratinivartate /
GR14jnass01u:866: pitaras tasya devāś ca puṇyaṃ dharma-vratāśanāḥ // Jss_1,6.43 //
GR14jnass01u:867: yamaḥ pratiṣṭhā lakṣmīś cābhīṣṭa-devo gurus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:868: nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti tyaktvā pāpaṃ ca pūruṣam // Jss_1,6.44 //
GR14jnass01u:869: strī-ghnaiś caiva kṛta-ghnaiś ca brahma-ghnair guru-talpa-gaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:870: viśvāsa-ghātibhir duṣṭair mitra-drohibhir eva ca // Jss_1,6.45 //
GR14jnass01u:871: satya-ghnaiś ca kṛta-ghnaiś ca pāpibhiḥ sthāpibhis tathā /
GR14jnass01u:883: tulyo bhavati viprendrātithir eva tv anarcitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:884: itya evam uktvā muniḥ pūjayām āsa nāradam /
GR14jnass01u:885: miṣṭaṃ ca bhojayām āsa śāyayām āsa bhaktitaḥ // Jss_1,6.52 //
GR14jnass01u:886: śrī-nārada uvāca nārado 'haṃ muni-śreṣṭha brāhmaṇo brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:887: tapaḥ-sthalād āgato 'haṃ yāmi kailāsam īpsitam // Jss_1,6.53 //
GR14jnass01u:888: ātmānaṃ pāvanaṃ kartuṃ tvāṃ ca draṣṭum ihāgataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:890: ko bhavān dhyāna-pūtaś ca nagnaś ca kaṭa-mastakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:891: kiṃ dhyāyase mahā-bhāga śreṣṭha-devaś ca ko guruh // Jss_1,6.55 //
GR14jnass01u:892: munir uvāca jīva-mukto bhavān eva punāsi bhuvana-trayam /
GR14jnass01u:893: yasya tatra kule janma tasya tat-tad-vacomanaḥ // Jss_1,6.56 //
GR14jnass01u:894: putre yaśasi toye ca kavitvena ca vidyayā /
GR14jnass01u:895: pratiśhṭhāyāṃ ca jñāyeta sarveṣāṃ mānasaṃ nṛṇām // Jss_1,6.57 //
GR14jnass01u:899: nagno'lpāyur vivekī ca vāsasā kiṃ prayojanam // Jss_1,6.59 //
GR14jnass01u:900: vṛkṣa-mūle nivāse me chatreṇa kiṃ gṛheṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:904: kiṃ kalatreṇa putreṇa dhanena saṃpadā śriyā /
GR14jnass01u:905: kiṃ vittena ca rūpeṇa jīvanālpāyuṣā mune // Jss_1,6.62 //
GR14jnass01u:907: manoś ca patanaṃ tatra māyayā kiṃ prayojanam // Jss_1,6.63 //
GR14jnass01u:909: alpāyuṣo mama mune maraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet // Jss_1,6.64 //
GR14jnass01u:911: parasya prakṛtes tasya kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,6.65 //
GR14jnass01u:913: gurur me jagatāṃ nātho yogīndrāṇāṃ guruḥ śivaḥ // Jss_1,6.66 //
GR14jnass01u:915: guror niṣedho yatrāste tad vaktuṃ kaḥ kṣamo bhuvi // Jss_1,6.67 //
GR14jnass01u:916: guroś ca vacanaṃ yo hi pālanaṃ na karoti ca /
GR14jnass01u:917: gurūktam uktvā pāpī sa brahma-hatyāṃ labhed dhruvam // Jss_1,6.68 //
GR14jnass01u:918: sva-guruṃ śiva-rūpaṃ ca tad-bhinnaṃ manyate hi yaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:919: brahma-hatyāṃ labhet so 'pi vighnas tasya pade pade // Jss_1,6.69 //
GR14jnass01u:920: akartavyaṃ tu kartavyaṃ pālanīyaṃ guror vacaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:921: apālane sarva-vighnaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,6.70 //
GR14jnass01u:923: mucyate sarva-pāpebhyo jīvan-mukto bhaven naraḥ // Jss_1,6.71 //
GR14jnass01u:924: sva-guruṃ śaṅkaraṃ paśya gaccha kailāsam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:929: saṃbhāṣya lomaśaṃ tasmāj jagāma nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:937: sa munir nāradaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktyā ca praṇanāma ca /
GR14jnass01u:938: papraccha kuśalaṃ śāntaṃ śāntaḥ sattva-guṇāśrayaḥ // Jss_1,7.5 //
GR14jnass01u:939: mārkaṇḍeyo uvāca adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvanaṃ cātisārthakam /
GR14jnass01u:940: mamāśrame puṇya-rāśir brahma-putraś ca nāradaḥ // Jss_1,7.6 //
GR14jnass01u:942: kva yāsi kuta āyāsi kiṃ te manasi vartate // Jss_1,7.7 //
GR14jnass01u:944: manonurūpaṃ vākyaṃ ca vākyena prasphuṭaṃ manaḥ // Jss_1,7.8 //
GR14jnass01u:945: muneś ca vacanaṃ śrutvā vīṇā-pāṇi svam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:946: uvāca sasmitaṃ śāntaṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ sudhopamam // Jss_1,7.9 //
GR14jnass01u:947: nārada uvāca he bandho yāmi kailāsaṃ jñānārthaṃ jñānināṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:948: draṣṭuṃ mahā-devaṃ ca praṇāmaṃ kartum īśvaram // Jss_1,7.10 //
GR14jnass01u:949: pūjāṃ gṛhītvā cety uktvā prayayau nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:950: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca śokārtaḥ sadvicchedaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // Jss_1,7.11 //
GR14jnass01u:951: himālayaṃ ca durlaghyaṃ vilaghyaṃ caiva līlayā /
GR14jnass01u:956: siddhendraiś ca munīndraiś yogīndraiḥ pariśobhitam // Jss_1,7.14 //
GR14jnass01u:957: praṇatāṃs tāṃś ca saṃbhāṣya pārvatī-kānanaṃ yayau /
GR14jnass01u:959: śobhitaṃ sundarai ramyaiḥ saptabhiś ca sarovaraiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:962: puṣpodyānaiś ca śatakaiḥ puṣpitaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ // Jss_1,7.17 //
GR14jnass01u:966: viṣṇu-krāntā ca tulasī śophalī saptalā tathā // Jss_1,7.19 //
GR14jnass01u:969: kharjūraiś ca guvākaiś ca palāsair jambubhis tathā /
GR14jnass01u:970: dāḍimbaiś cāpi jambīrair nimbaiś caiva vaṭais tathā // Jss_1,7.21 //
GR14jnass01u:972: kadambānāṃ kadambaiś ca tintiṇḍīnāṃ kadambakaiḥ // Jss_1,7.22 //
GR14jnass01u:975: picchilaiḥ parṇa-śālaiś ca gambhāribhiś ca valgukaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:976: hiṅgulair añjanair valkair bhūrja-patraiḥ sapatrakaiḥ // Jss_1,7.24 //
GR14jnass01u:977: anyaiś ca durlabhair vanyaiḥ puṣpa-patrair virājitam /
GR14jnass01u:980: anyaiś ca durlabhair vanyaiḥ puṣpa-patrair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,7.26 //
GR14jnass01u:982: śārdūlendraiś ca mahiṣair aśvaiś ca vanya-śūkaraiḥ // Jss_1,7.27 //
GR14jnass01u:983: śallakair ballakair markaiḥ kūṭaiś ca śaśakaiḥ śakaiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:992: parasparaṃ ca suprītaṃ hiṃsrāṇāṃ kṣudra-jantubhiḥ // Jss_1,7.32 //
GR14jnass01u:994: munīndrair indra-nīlaiś ca padma-rāgaiḥ pariṣkṛtam // Jss_1,7.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1000: paritaḥ paritaḥ śaśvan mālājālair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,7.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1004: mārjitaṃ citritaṃ citraiḥ parito raṅga-vastubhiḥ // Jss_1,7.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1005: dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutaṃ śīghraṃ prayayau svar-ṇadīṃ muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1009: snāṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca saṃpūjya paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1010: prakṛteḥ parimiṣṭaṃ ca nirliptaṃ nirguṇaṃ param // Jss_1,7.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1011: sākṣiṇaṃ karmaṇām eva brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam /
GR14jnass01u:1012: prayayau purato ramyaṃ rāja-mārgaṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1014: pariṣkṛtaṃ ca sarvatra nirmitaṃ viśva-karmaṇā // Jss_1,7.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1018: rathaṃ dadarśa purato manoyāyi manoharam // Jss_1,7.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1020: dhanur lakṣaṃ parimitaṃ parito vartulākṛtam // Jss_1,7.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1022: dhanur lakṣo 'pi sūtaṃ ca vahni-śuddhāṃśukānvitam // Jss_1,7.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1032: golokād āgataṃ pūrvaṃ krīḍārthaṃ śaṅkarasya ca // Jss_1,7.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1034: rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca prayayau kiyad dūraṃ mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,7.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1040: dadarśa śiviraṃ śambhoḥ parikhābhis tribhir yutam // Jss_1,7.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1042: prakāraiś ca tribhir yuktaṃ dhanur lakṣocchritaṃ suta // Jss_1,7.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1044: dhanuḥ-śata-sahasraṃ ca caturasraṃ ca sammitam // Jss_1,7.58 //
GR14jnass01u:1046: atīva ramyaṃ purato pura-dvāraṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1047: purato ratna-bhittau ca kṛtrimaṃ ca suśobhitam /
GR14jnass01u:1048: puṇyaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ ramyaṃ tan-madhye rāsa-maṇḍalam // Jss_1,7.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1052: dvāra-pālaṃ ca tatraiva maṇi-bhadraṃ bhayaṃkaram // Jss_1,7.62 //
GR14jnass01u:1054: taṃ saṃbhāṣya vilokyaivaṃ dvitīya-dvāram īpsitam // Jss_1,7.63 //
GR14jnass01u:1055: jagāma ca muni-śreṣṭho dadarśa citram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1056: kadambānāṃ samūhaṃ ca tan-mūlaṃ ca manoharam // Jss_1,7.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1058: snātaṃ gopī-samūhaṃ ca nagna-sarvāṅgam adbhutam // Jss_1,7.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1060: tatraiva śūla-hastaṃ ca mahā-kālaṃ dadarśa ca // Jss_1,7.66 //
GR14jnass01u:1061: kṛpāluṃ dvāra-pālaṃ taṃ saṃbhāṣya nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1062: prayayau śīghra-gāmī sa tṛtīya-dvāram uttamam // Jss_1,7.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1064: gopānāṃ ca samūhaṃ ca pītambara-dharaṃ param // Jss_1,7.68 //
GR14jnass01u:1065: bāla-krīḍāṃ ca kurvantaṃ tan-madhye kṛṣṇam uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1066: brāhmaṇībhiḥ pradattam ca bhuktavantaṃ supāyasam // Jss_1,7.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1067: kurvantaṃ ca samādhānaṃ muneḥ vāma-kareṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:1068: gṛhītvā tad-anujñāṃ ca caturthaṃ dvāram īpsitam // Jss_1,7.70 //
GR14jnass01u:1069: prayayau brahma-putraś ca dadarśa citram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1070: govardhanaṃ parvataṃ ca tatra kṛṣṇa-kara-sthitam // Jss_1,7.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1072: vyākulaṃ gokulaṃ bhītaṃ śakra-vṛṣṭi-bhayena ca // Jss_1,7.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1073: abhayaṃ dattavantaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ dakṣa-kareṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:1074: nandinaṃ dvāra-pālaṃ ca śūla-hastaṃ ca sasmitam // Jss_1,7.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1075: vilokya prayayau vipraḥ pañcamaṃ dvāṛam uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1077: tatraiva nīpa-mūlaṃ ca yamunākulam eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1078: kālīya-damanaṃ tatra kṛtimaṃ ca dadarśa ḥa // Jss_1,7.75 //
GR14jnass01u:1079: tad dṛṣṭvā sasmitas tuṣṭaḥ ṣaṣṭa-dvāṛaṃ jagāma saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1080: dvāre niyuktaṃ bālaṃ ca śūla-hastaṃ catur-bhujam // Jss_1,7.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1082: dadarśa citraṃ tatraiva mathurā-gamanaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,7.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1084: vyākulaṃ gokulaṃ cāpi ratha-sthaṃ śaraṇaṃ harim // Jss_1,7.78/ //
GR14jnass01u:1085: akrūraṃ ca tathā nandaṃ nirānandaṃ śucākulam /
GR14jnass01u:1086: tad dṛṣṭvā saptama-dvāraṃ dvāra-pālaṃ dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,7.79 //
GR14jnass01u:1088: sabalaṃ gopa-sahitaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,7.80 //
GR14jnass01u:1090: vīkṣantaṃ sādaraṃ sarvair nagara-sthair manoharam // Jss_1,7.81 //
GR14jnass01u:1092: sabhāryaṃ vasudevaṃ ca nigaḍān muktam īpsitam // Jss_1,7.82 //
GR14jnass01u:1094: dhyāna-sthaṃ ca vibhāntaṃ ca śuddha-sphaṭika-mālayā // Jss_1,7.83 //
GR14jnass01u:1096: nirliptaṃ nirguṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paramaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,7.84 //
GR14jnass01u:1097: dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca sura-śreṣṭhaṃ muni-śreṣṭho 'pi nāradaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1101: bho gaṇeśa sura-śreṣṭha lambodara parāt para /
GR14jnass01u:1108: yaḥ pūjitaḥ surendraiś ca munīndrais taṃ namāmy aham // Jss_1,7.89 //
GR14jnass01u:1110: puṇyakena vratenaiva yaṃ prāpa pārvatī satī // Jss_1,7.90 //
GR14jnass01u:1112: jñāni-śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca taṃ namāmi gaṇeśvaram // Jss_1,7.91 //
GR14jnass01u:1113: ity evam uktvā devarṣis tatraivāntar dadhe vibhuḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1114: nāradaḥ prayayau śīghram īśvarābhyantaraṃ mudā // Jss_1,7.92 //
GR14jnass01u:1116: pūjā-kāle paṭhen nityaṃ jayas tasya pade pade // Jss_1,7.93 //
GR14jnass01u:1117: saṃkalpitaṃ paṭhed yo hi varṣam ekaṃ susaṃyataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1121: ihaiva ca sukhaṃ bhaktyānte yāti hareḥ padam // Jss_1,7.95 //
GR14jnass01u:1125: śrī-vyāsa uvāca atha cābhyantaraṃ gatvā nārado hṛṣṭa-mānasaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1126: dadarśa svāśramaṃ ramyam atīva sumanoharam // Jss_1,8.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1128: sākṣād gorocanābhaiś ca maṇi-stambhair vibhūṣitam // Jss_1,8.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1134: sudhānāṃ ca madhūnām ca pūrṇa-kumbhakaṃ śataṃ śatam // Jss_1,8.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1137: tad dṛṣṭvā ca muni-śreṣṭhas tat parābhyantaraṃ yayau /
GR14jnass01u:1138: ratna-siṃhāsana-sthaṃ ca śaṅkaraṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // Jss_1,8.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1140: prasanna-vadanaṃ svacchaṃ śāntaṃ śrīmantam īśvaram // Jss_1,8.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1142: bhakta-priyaṃ ca bhakteśaṃ jvalantaṃ brahma-tejasā // Jss_1,8.9 //
GR14jnass01u:1144: japantaṃ paramātmānaṃ brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam // Jss_1,8.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1145: nirliptaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca dātāraṃ sarva-sampadām /
GR14jnass01u:1146: svecchā-mayaṃ sarva-bījaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ // Jss_1,8.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1147: siddhendraiś ca munīndraiś ca devendraiḥ parisevitam /
GR14jnass01u:1150: purato hi vasantaṃ taṃ skandaṃ gaṇa-patīm tathā // Jss_1,8.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1152: yogīndraṃ sva-guruṃ śaṃbhuṃ śirasā praṇanāma saḥ // Jss_1,8.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1153: tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā devarṣir jagatāṃ patim /
GR14jnass01u:1154: sva-guruṃ ca paśu-patiṃ vedoktena stavena ca // Jss_1,8.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1155: śrī-nārada uvāca namas tubhyaṃ jagan-nātha mama nātha mama prabho /
GR14jnass01u:1157: abījaja praja prāja sarva-bīja namo 'stu te /
GR14jnass01u:1164: ity evam uktvā devarṣiḥ śambhoś ca purataḥ sthitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1165: prasanna-vadanaḥ śrīmān bhagavāṃs tam uvāca saḥ // Jss_1,8.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1166: śrī-mahā-deva uvāca varaṃ vṛṇu mahā-bhāga yat te manasi vartate /
GR14jnass01u:1167: dāsyāmi tvāṃ dhruvaṃ putra dātāhaṃ sarva-saṃpadām // Jss_1,8.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1168: sukhaṃ muktiṃ harer bhaktiṃ niścalām avināśinīm /
GR14jnass01u:1174: hareḥ padaṃ ca gamanaṃ sa-śarīreṇa līlayā /
GR14jnass01u:1175: eteṣu vāñchitārtheṣu kiṃ vā te vāñchitaṃ suta // Jss_1,8.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1176: tan me brūhi muni-śreṣṭha sarvaṃ dātum ahaṃ kṣamaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1177: śaṅkarasya vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,8.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1178: śrī-nārada uvāca dehi me hari-bhaktiṃ ca tan-nāma-sevane ruciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1179: ati-tṛṣṇā guṇākhyāne nityam astu mameśvara // Jss_1,8.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1180: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā jahāsa śaṅkaraḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1181: pārvatī bhadra-kālī ca kārttikeyo gaṇeśvaraḥ // Jss_1,8.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1182: sarvaṃ dadau mahā-devo nāradāya ca dhīmate /
GR14jnass01u:1184: nāradena kṛtaṃ stotraṃ nityaṃ yaḥ prapaṭhet śuciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1185: hari-bhaktir bhavet tasya tan-nāmni guṇato ruciḥ // Jss_1,8.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1187: sarva-siddhir bhavet tasya siddha-stotro bhaved yadi // Jss_1,8.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1188: iha prāpnoti lakṣmīṃ ca niścalāṃ lakṣa-pauruṣīm /
GR14jnass01u:1189: pari-pūrṇam ahaiśvaryam ante yāti hareḥ padam // Jss_1,8.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1191: susādhyāṃ suvinītāṃ suvratāṃ ca pati-vratām // Jss_1,8.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1192: prajāṃ bhūmiṃ yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ vidyāṃ sa-kavitāṃ labhet /
GR14jnass01u:1193: prasūyate mahā-bandhyā varṣam ekaṃ śṛṇoti cet // Jss_1,8.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1195: dhanī mahā-daridraś ca kṛpaṇaḥ satyavān bhavet /
GR14jnass01u:1196: viprad-grasto rāja-baddho mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,8.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1200: śrī-vyāsa uvāca varaṃ datvā mahā-devo bhaktyā taṃ brāhmaṇātithim /
GR14jnass01u:1201: pūjāṃ cakāra vedoktāṃ svayaṃ veda-vidāṃ varaḥ // Jss_1,9.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1205: mahā-devaḥ sabhā-madhye kṛpayā ca kṛpā-nidhiḥ // Jss_1,9.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1206: śrī-mahā-deva uvāca kiṃ vā te vāñchitaṃ vatsa brūhi māṃ yadi rocate /
GR14jnass01u:1207: varo dattaḥ kim aparaṃ yat te manasi vartate // Jss_1,9.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1209: kailāse ca sabhā-madhye yat tan-manasi vāñchitam // Jss_1,9.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1210: śrī-nārada uvāca jñānam ādhyātmikaṃ nāma veda-sāraṃ manoharam /
GR14jnass01u:1211: hari-bhakti-pradaṃ jñānaṃ muktidaṃ jñānam īpsitam // Jss_1,9.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1212: yoga-yuktaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ jñānaṃ yat siddhidaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1215: vidhavānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ yatīnāṃ brahma-cāriṇāṃ // Jss_1,9.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1219: saṃsāra-vāsanāṃ kāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtīśayoḥ // Jss_1,9.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1220: tayoḥ paraṃ vā kiṃ vastu tasyāvatāra-varṇamam /
GR14jnass01u:1221: ko vā tad-aṃśaḥ kaḥ pūrṇaḥ paripūrṇatamaś ca kaḥ // Jss_1,9.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1223: yad dattaṃ kiṃ tad deveśa tad ārādhyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Jss_1,9.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1224: mayā jñānaṃm anāpṛṣṭhaṃ yad yad asti surottama /
GR14jnass01u:1225: tan me kathaya tattvena mām evānugrahaṃ kuru // Jss_1,9.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1226: guroś ca jñānodgiraṇāj jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1227: tat tantraṃ sa ca mantraḥ syād yato bhaktir adhokṣaje // Jss_1,9.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1231: nirīkṣya pārvatī-vaktraṃ gaja-vaktram uvāca saḥ // Jss_1,9.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1233: śrī-mahā-deva uvāca aho ananta-dāsānāṃ māhātmyaṃ paramādbhutam /
GR14jnass01u:1234: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktiṃ ye ca śaśvad dhareḥ pade // Jss_1,9.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1238: vāñchanty eva hi tīrthāni vasudhā cātma-śuddhaye // Jss_1,9.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1240: punāti sarva-tīrthāni vasudhām api pārvati // Jss_1,9.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1241: kṛṣṇa-mantro dvija-mukhād yasya karṇaṃ prayāti ca /
GR14jnass01u:1242: taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jagat-pūtaṃ pravadanti purā-vidaḥ // Jss_1,9.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1244: punāti līlā-mātreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ śataṃ śatam // Jss_1,9.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1245: yaj janma-mātrāt pūtaṃ ca tat pitṛṇāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GR14jnass01u:1246: prayāti sadyo golokaṃ karma-bhogāt pramucyate // Jss_1,9.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1248: yat kanyāṃ pratigṛhṇāti tasya saptāvalīlayā // Jss_1,9.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1249: mātaraṃ tat-praśūṃ bhāryāṃ putrāc ca sapta-pūruṣam /
GR14jnass01u:1250: bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ kanyāṃ kṛṣṇa-bhaktaḥ samuddharet // Jss_1,9.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1252: phalaṃ sa lebhe pūjānāṃ vratī sarva-vrateṣu ca // Jss_1,9.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1253: viṣṇu-mantraṃ yo labhet vaiṣṇavāc ca dvijottamāt /
GR14jnass01u:1254: koṭi-janmārjitāt pāpān mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,9.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1256: śata-janmārjitāt pāpān mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,9.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1258: sadyaḥ pūtaṃ jalaṃ vahnir jagat pūtaḥ samīraṇaḥ // Jss_1,9.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1259: darśanaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devā vāñchanti nityaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1260: na vaiṣṇavāt paraḥ pūto viśveṣu nikhileṣu ca // Jss_1,9.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1261: ity uktvā saṅkaraḥ śīghraṃ nāradena sahātmajaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1262: yayau mandākinī-tīraṃ nīraṃ kṣīropamaṃ param // Jss_1,9.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1263: tatra snāto mahā-devī nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1264: samācāntaḥ śucis tatra dhṛtvā dhaute ca vāsavī // Jss_1,9.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1269: mantraṃ gṛhītvā sa muniḥ śivaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GR14jnass01u:1270: sapta vārān namas kṛtya svātmānaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadau // Jss_1,9.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1273: etasminn antare vatsa puṣpa-vṛṣṭir babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1274: nāradopari tatraiva suśrāva dundubhir muniḥ // Jss_1,9.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1276: brahmā jagāma tatraiva suprasannaś ca sasmitaḥ // Jss_1,9.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1278: śambhuś ca pūjayām āsa brāhmaṇam atithiṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1279: śambhuṃ śubhāśiṣaṃ kṛtvā brahma-lokaṃ yayau vidhiḥ // Jss_1,9.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1283: śrī-śuka uvāca nārado hi mahā-jñānī devarṣir brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1284: sarva-veda-vidāṃ śreṣṭho gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhakaḥ // Jss_1,10.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1285: kathaṃ sa nopadiṣṭaś ca jñāna-hīno mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1286: tan māṃ bodhaya vibho sandeha-bhañjanaṃ kuru // Jss_1,10.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1287: śrī-vyāsa uvāca nārado brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ purā-kalpe babhūva saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1288: sarva-jñānaṃ dadau tasmai vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,10.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1289: vedāṃś ca pāṭhayām āsa vedāṅgāny api suvrata /
GR14jnass01u:1291: bhagavān ekadā putraṃ kathayām āsa saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1292: sṛṣṭiṃ kuru mahā-bhāga kṛtvā dāra-parigraham // Jss_1,10.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1294: uvāca pitaraṃ kopāt paraṃ kṛṣṇa-parāyanaḥ // Jss_1,10.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1295: śrī-nārada uvāca sarveṣām api vandyānāṃ pitā caiva mahā-guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1296: jñāna-dātuḥ paro vandyo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // Jss_1,10.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1298: janma-dātānna-dātā syāt sneha-kartā pitā sadā // Jss_1,10.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1299: na kṣamau tau ca pitarau putrasya karma khaṇḍitum /
GR14jnass01u:1301: guruś ca jñānodgiraṇāt jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1302: tat tantraṃ sa ca mantraś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktir yato bhavet // Jss_1,10.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1304: viṣam atyamṛtaṃ tyaktvā sa ca mūḍho narādhamaḥ // Jss_1,10.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1305: sa guruḥ sa pitā vandyaḥ sā mātā sa patiḥ sutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1306: yo dadāti harau bhaktiṃ karma-mūla-nikṛntanī // Jss_1,10.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1309: aho jagad-vidhātuś ca dharma-śāstur iyaṃ matiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1310: svayaṃ māyā-mohitaś ca paraṃ bhraṣṭaṃ karoti ca // Jss_1,10.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1311: viṣṇus tvāṃ mohitām kṛtvā yuyoja sraṣṭum īśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1312: na dadau svātma-bhaktiṃ tāṃ sva-dāsyaṃ cāti-durlabham // Jss_1,10.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1314: sa ca bālo na jānāti kathaṃbhūtaṃ ca modakam // Jss_1,10.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1315: bālakaṃ vañcanaṃ kṛtvā miṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ pradāya saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1316: pitā prayāti kāryārthaṃ viṣṇunā mohitas tathā // Jss_1,10.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1318: na yuktaṃ patanaṃ tatra tad uddhāram abhīpsitam // Jss_1,10.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1319: jñānī guruś ca balavān bhavābdheḥ śiṣyam uddharet /
GR14jnass01u:1320: guruḥ svayam asiddhaś ca durbalaḥ katham uddharet // Jss_1,10.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1323: sa guruḥ paramo vairī yo dadāti hy asan-matim /
GR14jnass01u:1324: taṃ namas-kṛtya sat-śiṣyaḥ prayāti jñānadaṃ gurum // Jss_1,10.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1326: durbalo durvahaṃ bhāraṃ dadāti janakāya ca // Jss_1,10.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1327: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ putram uvāca saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1329: brahmovāca jñānaṃ te bhavatu bhraṣṭaṃ strī-jito bhava pāmara /
GR14jnass01u:1330: sarva-jātiṣu gandharvaḥ kāmī so 'pi bhavān bhava // Jss_1,10.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1332: tāsāṃ vaśaś ca satataṃ strīṇāṃ krīḍā mṛgo yathā // Jss_1,10.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1334: tāsāṃ nityaṃ yauvanānāṃ sundarīṇāṃ priyo bhava // Jss_1,10.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1336: nirjane nirjane ramye vane krīḍāṃ kariṣyasi // Jss_1,10.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1338: vipra-dāsyāṃ tu śūdrāyāṃ janiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,10.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1341: tātasya vacanaṃ śrutvā cukopa nārado muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1342: śaśāpa pitaraṃ śighraṃ dāruṇaṃ ca yathocitam // Jss_1,10.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1343: apūjyo bhava duṣṭaṃ tvaṃ tvan-mantropāsakaḥ kutaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1344: agamyāgamanecchā te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,10.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1345: nāradasya tu śāpena so 'pūjyo jagatāṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1346: dṛṣṭvā sva-kanyā-rūpaṃ ca paścād dhāvitavān purā // Jss_1,10.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1348: lajjitaḥ kāma-yuktaś ca punar brahmā babhūva saḥ // Jss_1,10.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1350: vipra-dehaṃ parityajya gandharvaś ca babhūva saḥ // Jss_1,10.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1352: jahāra kanyāḥ pañcāśat balāc citra-rathasya tu // Jss_1,10.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1353: gāndharvena vivāhena tā uvāha ca nirjane /
GR14jnass01u:1354: mūrcchāṃ prāpuś ca tāḥ kanyā dṛṣṭvā sundaram īśvaram // Jss_1,10.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1355: visaspuruś ca pitaraṃ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1356: remire tena sārdhaṃ ca kāmukyaḥ kāmukena ca // Jss_1,10.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1358: śaile śaile surahasi kānane kānane tathā // Jss_1,10.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1359: puṣpodyane taru-dyāne nadyāṃ nadyāṃ nade nade /
GR14jnass01u:1368: divāniśaṃ na jānanti kāminā sasmitena ca // Jss_1,10.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1370: svāhā-vane kāmyake ca ramyake pāribhadrake // Jss_1,10.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1371: surandhake gandhake ca suraṅhre puṇḍrake 'pi ca /
GR14jnass01u:1376: suvele ca supārśve ca pravālāṃkura-kānane // Jss_1,10.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1377: mandāre mandire pūre gāndhāre ca yugandhare /
GR14jnass01u:1380: campakānāṃ palāśānāṃ kundānāṃ vipine tathā // Jss_1,10.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1386: jambīrāṇāṃ ca jambūnāṃ karañjānāṃ tathaiva ca // Jss_1,10.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1387: kṛtvā bihāraṃ tābhiś ca gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1388: divyaṃ varṣa-sahasraṃ ca svāśramaṃ punar āyayau // Jss_1,10.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1389: śrutvā vidhātur āhvānaṃ puṣkaraṃ ca yayau punaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1393: suśobhitaṃ yathā candraṃ gagane bhagaṇaiḥ saha /
GR14jnass01u:1394: praṇanāma sabhā-madhye tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ jagad-vidhim // Jss_1,10.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1395: maheśaṃ ca gaṇeśaṃ ca dhaneśaṃ śeṣam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1398: yamam aṣṭau vasūn rudrān jayantaṃ nalakūvaram // Jss_1,10.58 //
GR14jnass01u:1400: agastyaṃ ca pulastyaṃ ca pulahaṃ ca pracetasam // Jss_1,10.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1401: sarva-śreṣṭhaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca dakṣaṃ ca kardamaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1402: sanakaṃ sanandaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca sanātanam // Jss_1,10.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1403: sanat-kumāraṃ yogīśaṃ jñānināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:1404: voḍhuṃ pañca-śikhaṃ saṅkhaṃ bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ tathā // Jss_1,10.61 //
GR14jnass01u:1405: āsuriṃ kapilaṃ kautsaṃ kratuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ naram /
GR14jnass01u:1406: marīciṃ kaśyapaṃ kaṇvaṃ vyāsaṃ durvāsasaṃ kavim // Jss_1,10.62 //
GR14jnass01u:1407: bṛhaspatiṃ ca cyavanaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca lomaśam /
GR14jnass01u:1408: vālmīkiṃ paraśu-rāmaṃ saṃvartaṃ ca vibhāṇḍakam // Jss_1,10.63 //
GR14jnass01u:1410: etān sarvān namas-kṛtya tasthau sa purato vidheḥ // Jss_1,10.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1411: tuṣṭāva sarvān devāṃś ca munīndrāṃś ca tathaiva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1412: tam uvāca sabhā-madhye vidhātā jagatām api /
GR14jnass01u:1413: sasmitaḥ suprasannaś ca gandharvam upavarhaṇam // Jss_1,10.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1416: kuru vatsādhunātraiva śṛṇvantu munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,10.66 //
GR14jnass01u:1418: tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ jala-krīḍāṃ harer utkīrtanaṃ kuru // Jss_1,10.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1420: śrotāraṃ ca pravaktāraṃ puruṣaiḥ saptabhiḥ saha // Jss_1,10.68 //
GR14jnass01u:1422: tatra sarvāṇi tīrthāni puṇyāni maṅgalāni ca // Jss_1,10.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1424: dūrād eva palāyante vainateyam ivoragāḥ // Jss_1,10.70 //
GR14jnass01u:1425: tad dinaṃ saphalaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ sarva-maṅgalam /
GR14jnass01u:1426: śrī-kṛṣṇa-kīrtanaṃ yatra tatraiva nāyuṣo vyayaḥ // Jss_1,10.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1427: saṃkīrtana-dhvaniṃ śrutvā ye ca nṛtyanti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1428: teṣāṃ pāda-rajaḥ-sparśāt sadyaḥ pūtā vasundharā // Jss_1,10.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1430: sthānaṃ tac ca bhavet tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ tatra muktidam // Jss_1,10.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1431: nātra pāpāni tiṣṭhanti puṇyāni susthirāṇi ca /
GR14jnass01u:1432: tapasvināṃ ca vratināṃ vratānāṃ tapasāṃ sthalam // Jss_1,10.74 //
GR14jnass01u:1433: vartate pāpināṃ dehe pāpāni tri-vidhāni ca /
GR14jnass01u:1436: strīṇāṃ ca vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca sa mahā-pātakī smṛtaḥ // Jss_1,10.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1437: bhrūṇā-ghnaś cāpi go-ghnaś ca śūdra-ghnaś ca kṛta-ghnakaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1438: viśvāsa-ghātī viḍ-bhojī sa eva hy upapātakī // Jss_1,10.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1442: mucyante pātakais tais taiḥ pāpinas tri-vidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // Jss_1,10.79 //
GR14jnass01u:1444: bhikṣur yatir brahma-cārī vāna-prasthaś ca tāpasaḥ // Jss_1,10.80 //
GR14jnass01u:1445: pavitraḥ paramo vahniḥ supavitraṃ jalaṃ yathā /
GR14jnass01u:1446: ete sarve vaiṣṇavānāṃ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Jss_1,10.81 //
GR14jnass01u:1448: paśyanti ca śilā-cakraṃ pūjāṃ kurvanti nityaśaḥ // Jss_1,10.82 //
GR14jnass01u:1449: jīvan-muktās ca te dhanyā hari-dāsāś ca bhārate /
GR14jnass01u:1450: pade pade 'śvamedhasya prāpnuvanti phalaṃ dhruvam // Jss_1,10.83 //
GR14jnass01u:1452: teṣāṃ ca pāda-rajasā tīrthaṃ pūtaṃ tathā dharā // Jss_1,10.84/ //
GR14jnass01u:1453: teṣāṃ ca darśanaṃ sparśaṃ vāñchanti munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1454: puruṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ ca pūtaṃ taj-janma-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,10.85 //
GR14jnass01u:1455: ity uktvā jagatāṃ dhātā tatra tūṣṇīṃ babhūva saḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1456: āścaryaṃ menire śrutvā devāś ca munayas tathā // Jss_1,10.86 //
GR14jnass01u:1458: gandharvāś cāpi vividhā nanṛtuḥ kinnarā jaguḥ // Jss_1,10.87 //
GR14jnass01u:1459: rambhor vaśī ghṛtācī ca menakā ca tilottamā /
GR14jnass01u:1460: sudhāmukhī pūrṇa-cittī mohinī kalikā tathā // Jss_1,10.88 //
GR14jnass01u:1462: etāś cānyāś ca bahvyaś ca śvaśvat susthira-yauvanāḥ // Jss_1,10.89 //
GR14jnass01u:1464: īṣaddhāsyāḥ prasannāsyāḥ kāmārtāś ca samāyayuḥ // Jss_1,10.90 //
GR14jnass01u:1465: veda-jñā mūrtimantaś ca vedāś cātvāra eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1466: brāhmaṇā bhikṣavaḥ siddhā yatayo brahma-cāriṇaḥ // Jss_1,10.91 //
GR14jnass01u:1468: lakṣmī sarasvatī durgā sāvitrī rohiṇī ratiḥ // Jss_1,10.92 //
GR14jnass01u:1469: tulasī pṛthivī gaṅgā svāhā ca yamunā tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1470: vāruṇī manasendrāṇī tāḥ sarvā deva-yoṣitaḥ // Jss_1,10.93 //
GR14jnass01u:1473: vicitrāṃ ca brahma-sabhāṃ puṣkaraṃ tīrtham āyayuḥ // Jss_1,10.94 //
GR14jnass01u:1478: śrī-vyāsa uvāca atha gandharva-rājas tu bhagavān ājñayā vidheḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1479: saṃgītaṃ ca jagau tatra kṛṣṇa-rāsa-mahotsavam // Jss_1,11.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1480: susamaṃ tālamānaṃ ca sutānaṃ madhuraṃ śrutam /
GR14jnass01u:1486: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā surāḥ sarve munayaḥ sarva-yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1487: mūrcchāṃ prāyuś ca sahasā cetanāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,11.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1489: tābhyo vastra-pradānaṃ ca saṃmānaṃ varadānakam // Jss_1,11.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1493: saṃprāpuś ca punar mūrcchāṃ punaḥ prāpuś ca cetanām // Jss_1,11.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1494: tasmai dadau puro brahmā vahni-śuddhāṃśukaṃ param /
GR14jnass01u:1500: pratyekaṃ vastu ruciraṃ tad-yoṣidbhyaś ca saṃdadau /
GR14jnass01u:1501: viśvakarmā ca nirmāṇa-maṇiṃ bhūṣaṇam uttamam // Jss_1,11.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1511: dhanur lakṣocchritaṃ caiva sahasrāśvena yojitam // Jss_1,11.17/
GR14jnass01u:1512: etad eva dadau brahmā prahṛṣṭas tuṣṭa eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1513: śambhus tuṣṭo dadau hṛṣṭo hari-bhaktiṃ ca niścalām // Jss_1,11.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1516: hareś carcāvidhānaṃ ca stavanaṃ pūjanaṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1520: nāgebhyaś cābhyaṃ nityaṃ hisra-jantubhya eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1522: nirvighnatvaṃ dadau tasmai vighn-rājaś ca saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1525: maṇi-rājaṃ sudīptaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu durlabham // Jss_1,11.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1526: sarvatra vijayaṃ caiva vāñcchitaṃ nirmalaṃ yaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1528: lakṣa-svarṇaṃ dhaneśaś ca dāsānāṃ ca śataṃ śatam /
GR14jnass01u:1529: dharmaḥ kīrtimayīṃ mālāṃ skando dhairyaṃ dadau tathā // Jss_1,11.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1532: candraḥ śvetāśva-ratnaṃ ca hy amūlyam uttamaṃ dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1533: vahni-śuddhāṃśuka-yugaṃ dadau vahniś ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,11.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1534: upendro ratna-koṭiṃ ca tad evendro dadau purā /
GR14jnass01u:1535: vīṇā-śilpaṃ viśvakarmā varuṇaś ca maṇi-srajam // Jss_1,11.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1541: vasavaś ca vasūn divyān rudras tebhyo 'bhayaṃ dadau // Jss_1,11.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1545: lakṣmīś ca paramaiśvaryaṃ bhāratī hāram uttamam // Jss_1,11.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1547: tat-patnībhyaś ca ratnāni sindūrābharaṇāni ca // Jss_1,11.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1549: tulasī cātulaṃ mālyaṃ divyaṃ vasu vasundharā // Jss_1,11.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1550: gaṅgā ca vipulaṃ puṇyaṃ svāhā sad-ratna-pāśakam /
GR14jnass01u:1551: yamunā jalajaṃ padmam amlānaṃ sārvakālikam // Jss_1,11.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1552: vāruṇīṃ vāruṇī tuṣṭā ratna-pātraṃ śacī dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1553: manasā pradadau tasmai nāgānāṃ mauli-maṇḍanam // Jss_1,11.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1554: gandharvāś cāpi tat-patnyaḥ sva-śilpaṃ pradadus tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1560: kiṃ babhūva rahasyaṃ ca tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,12.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1561: śrī-vyāsa uvāca saṃprāpya dānaṃ devānāṃ gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1562: teṣāṃ ca purato bhaktyā vidayām āsa vai sadā // Jss_1,12.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1563: śrutvā tad vacanaṃ brahmā tam uvāca ca saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1564: śambhunā ca samālocya brahmovāca vidhātā jagatām api // Jss_1,12.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1566: vilāpaṃ gopa-gopīnāṃ śrāvayāsmāṃś ca sāmpratam // Jss_1,12.4/ //
GR14jnass01u:1567: mahotsavaṃ kuru punaḥ śṛṇvantu munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1568: gāyantu tāś ca saṃgītaṃ nṛtyantv apsarāṃ gaṇāḥ // Jss_1,12.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1569: brahmaṇaś ca vacaḥ śrutvā nanṛtyuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1570: cakrus tāḥ sarasaṃ gītaṃ vidyādharyaś ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,12.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1574: mūrcchāṃ prāpuś ca rurudur dadur dānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,12.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1576: visvareṇa vitanāt tu tāla-bhaṅgo babhūva ha // Jss_1,12.9 //
GR14jnass01u:1577: tat tāla-bhaṅgaṃ vijñāya devāś ca munayas tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1578: cukupuḥ sahasā sarve nirgatās tan mukhāgnayaḥ // Jss_1,12.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1579: tad dṛṣṭvā sahasā bhīto gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1580: sasmāra kṛṣṇaṃ svabhīṣṭaṃ paramātmānam īśvaram // Jss_1,12.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1583: stambhitā vahnayaḥ sarve munayaś ca vijṛmbhitāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1585: dadṛśur devatāḥ sarvāḥ munayaś cāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1586: gandharvāś ca tathaivānye tejo dṛśyaṃ sukha-pradam // Jss_1,12.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1589: tat tejo 'bhyantare sarve dadṛśū ratham uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1599: mālājālais tri-lakṣaiś ca mālatīnāṃ ca maṇḍitam /
GR14jnass01u:1600: evaṃbhūtaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dadṛśus te tad-anantare // Jss_1,12.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1608: paraṃ pradhānaṃ paramaṃ paramātmānam īśvaram // Jss_1,12.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1611: nityaṃ nityaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca jyoti-rūpaṃ sanātanam /
GR14jnass01u:1614: mayūra-puccha-cūḍaṃ ca varaṃ vaṃśī-dharaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,12.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1615: dṛṣṭvā tam adbhutaṃ rūpaṃ tuṣṭāva kamalodbhavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1616: gaṇeśaḥ śeṣaḥ śambhuś ca tad-anye munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,12.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1617: brahmovāca paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1618: vande vandyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam // Jss_1,12.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1620: vedāvedyaṃ ca vidvadbhir na dṛṣṭaṃ svapna-gocare // Jss_1,12.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1623: prasiddhaṃ siddhidaṃ śāntaṃ siddhānāṃ ca guror gurum // Jss_1,12.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1624: vande vandyaṃ ca mahatāṃ parāt parataraṃ vibhum /
GR14jnass01u:1627: sva-pada-pradam ekaṃ ca dātāraṃ sarva-sampadām // Jss_1,12.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1628: ananta uvāca vaktrāṇāṃ ca sahasreṇa kiṃ vā staumi śruti-śrutam /
GR14jnass01u:1629: koṭibhiḥ koṭibhir vaktraiḥ ko vā stotuṃ kṣamaḥ prabho // Jss_1,12.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1630: kim u stoṣyati śambhuś ca pañca-vaktreṇa vāñcchitam /
GR14jnass01u:1631: kartā caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ kiṃ stoṣyati catur-mukhaḥ // Jss_1,12.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1632: ṣaḍ-vaktro gaja-vaktraś ca devāś ca munayo 'pi vā /
GR14jnass01u:1633: vedā vā kiṃ veda-vidaḥ stuvanti prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1635: veda-vijñāta-vākyena vidvāṃsaḥ kiṃ stuvanti tam // Jss_1,12.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1636: śrī-gaṇeśa uvāca mūrkho vadati viṣṇāya budho vadati viṣṇave /
GR14jnass01u:1637: nama ity evam artham ca dvayor eva samaṃ phalam // Jss_1,12.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1638: yasmai dattaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ jñāna-dātā hariḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1639: jñānena tena sa stauti bhāva-grāhī janārdanaḥ // Jss_1,12.40 //
GR14jnass01u:1641: adhanī ca dhanī vāpi saputro vāpy aputrakaḥ // Jss_1,12.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1642: karmaṇā param īśaṃ ca stotuṃ ko vāpy anuttamam /
GR14jnass01u:1643: yathā-śakti stutiḥ pūjā vandanaṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // Jss_1,12.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1645: kurvanti santo 'santaś ca santataṃ paramātmanaḥ // Jss_1,12.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1646: kārtikeya uvāca sarvāntarātmā bhagavān jñānaṃ ca sarva-jīvināṃ /
GR14jnass01u:1647: jñānānurūpaṃ stavanaṃ santo naiva hasanti tam // Jss_1,12.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1649: sarve sva-karma-vaśa-gā niṣekaḥ kena vāryate // Jss_1,12.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1650: sarveśvaraṃ ca saṃvīkṣya sarvo vadati mat-prabhum /
GR14jnass01u:1651: mad-īśvarasya samatā sarveṣu kiṃkareṣu ca // Jss_1,12.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1653: kecit tad-aṃśāṃśaṃ prāpnuvanti krameṇa tam // Jss_1,12.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1654: dharma uvāca ahaṃ sākṣī ca sarveṣāṃ vidhinā nirmitaḥ purā /
GR14jnass01u:1655: vidhātuś ca vidhātā tvaṃ sarveśvaraṃ namo 'stu te // Jss_1,12.48 //
GR14jnass01u:1656: devā ūcuḥ yaṃ stotum asamarthaś ca sahasrāyuḥ svayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1657: jñānādhidevaḥ śambhuś ca taṃ stotuṃ kiṃ vayaṃ kṣamāḥ // Jss_1,12.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1658: vedā ūcuḥ kiṃ jānīmo vayaṃ ke vāpy ananteśasya yo guṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1659: vayaṃ vedāś tvam asmākaṃ kāraṇasyāpi kārakaḥ // Jss_1,12.50 //
GR14jnass01u:1660: munayaḥ ūcuḥ yadi vedā na jānanti māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1661: na jānīmas tava guṇaṃ vedānusāriṇo vayam // Jss_1,12.51 //
GR14jnass01u:1662: sarasvaty uvāca vidyādhidevatāhaṃ ca vedā vidyādhidevakāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1663: vedādhidevo dhātā ca tad-īśaṃ staumi kiṃ prabho // Jss_1,12.52 //
GR14jnass01u:1664: padmovāca yat pāda-padmaṃ padmeśaḥ śeṣāś cānye surās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1665: dhyāyante munayo devā dhyāye taṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1666: sāvitry uvāca sāvitrī veda-mātāhaṃ vedānāṃ janako vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1667: tvām eva dhatte dhātaraṃ namāmi tri-guṇāt param // Jss_1,12.54 //
GR14jnass01u:1668: śrī-pārvaty uvāca tava vakṣasi rādhāhaṃ rāse vṛndāvane vane /
GR14jnass01u:1669: mahā-lakṣmīś ca vaikuṇṭhe pāda-padmārcane ratā // Jss_1,12.55 //
GR14jnass01u:1671: brahma-loke ca brahmāṇī veda-mātā ca bhāratī // Jss_1,12.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1672: tavājñayā ca devānām avirbhūtā ca tejasi /
GR14jnass01u:1673: nihatya daityān devārīn datvā rājyaṃ surāya ca // Jss_1,12.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1677: viṣṇor ahaṃ parā-śaktir viṣṇu-māyā ca vaiṣṇavī // Jss_1,12.59 //
GR14jnass01u:1679: viduṣāṃ rasanāgre ca pratyakṣaṃ hi sarasvatī // Jss_1,12.60 //
GR14jnass01u:1680: mahā-viṣṇoś ca mātāhaṃ viśvāni yasya lomasu /
GR14jnass01u:1686: yoginaḥ santataṃ santaḥ siddhāś ca vaiṣṇavās tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1687: anugrahaṃ kuru vibho buddhi-śaktir ahaṃ tava // Jss_1,12.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1688: iti saṃvṛtaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhet saṃyataḥ śuciḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1689: ihaiva ca sukhaṃ bhuṅkte yāty ante śrī-hareḥ padam // Jss_1,12.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1694: sānandaṃ sundaraṃ śuddhaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛteḥ param // Jss_1,12.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1698: rādhādharaṃ bhavādhāraṃ sarvādhāraṃ namāmi tam // Jss_1,12.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1701: dhyāyante yogino yogāt siddhāḥ siddheśvarāś ca yam /
GR14jnass01u:1702: taṃ dhyāye satataṃ śuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1704: sevante nirguṇaṃ brahma bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.72 //
GR14jnass01u:1705: nirliptaṃ ca nirīhaṃ ca paramātmānam īśvaram /
GR14jnass01u:1706: nityaṃ satyaṃ ca paraṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1707: yaṃ sṛṣṭer ādi-bhūtaṃ ca sarva-bījaṃ parāt param /
GR14jnass01u:1708: yoginas taṃ prapadyante bhagavantaṃ sanātanam // Jss_1,12.74 //
GR14jnass01u:1712: ity evam uktvā gandharvaḥ papāta dharaṇī-tale // Jss_1,12.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1713: nanāma daṇḍavad bhūmau deva-devaṃ parāt param /
GR14jnass01u:1714: iti tena kṛtaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhet prayataḥ śuciḥ // Jss_1,12.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1715: ihaiva jīvan-muktaś ca pare yāti parāṃ gatim /
GR14jnass01u:1716: hari-bhaktiṃ harer dāsyaṃ goloke ca nirāmayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1717: pārṣada-pravaratvaṃ ca labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Jss_1,12.78 //
GR14jnass01u:1721: śrī-śuka uvāca stotrāntare ca kāle ca kiṃ rahasyaṃ babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1722: tan me kathaya bhadraṃ te bhagavan bhagavad-vacaḥ // Jss_1,13.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1723: śrī-vyāsa uvāca stotrāntare ca kāle ca gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1725: sarvair devair ahaṃ śaptaś cādhunā deva-hetunā /
GR14jnass01u:1726: devānām agni-puñjaś ca pradīptaś ca sumeruvat // Jss_1,13.3 //
GR14jnass01u:1727: adhunā ca tvayi gate bhasmāsān māṃ kariṣyati /
GR14jnass01u:1728: ato rakṣa jagannātha māṃ samuddhartum arhasi // Jss_1,13.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1732: mām anāthaṃ bhayākrāntaṃ rakṣa rakṣa surānalāt // Jss_1,13.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1734: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā brahmeśo brahma-saṃsadi // Jss_1,13.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1738: śubhāśrayasya bhaktasya bhayaṃ kiṃ te mayi sthite // Jss_1,13.8 //
