GR14jnass01u:1742: punar na vidyate janma mantra-grahaṇa-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,13.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1743: nāsti kālād bhayaṃ tasya na niṣekād vidher api /
GR14jnass01u:1745: man-mantro hi dehāt pāpaṃ koṭi-janma-kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GR14jnass01u:1746: sudīpto jvalad-agniś ca tṛṇa-puñjaṃ dehād yathā // Jss_1,13.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1748: teṣāṃ pāpāni vepante koṭi-janma-kṛtāni ca // Jss_1,13.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1750: ante dāsyaṃ ca labhate gatvā golokam uttamam // Jss_1,13.14 //
GR14jnass01u:1751: yāvad āyur bhramet tāvat svatantro matta-kuñjaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1752: tataḥ pāpāḥ phalāyante vainateyād ivoragāḥ // Jss_1,13.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1753: teṣāṃ ca pāda-rajasā sadyaḥ pūtā vasundharā /
GR14jnass01u:1754: punāti sarva-tīrthāni dūrato darśanād api // Jss_1,13.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1755: pūtaś ca pavano vahnir jalaṃ ca tulasī-dalam /
GR14jnass01u:1756: pūtāny eva hi tīrthāni gaṅgādīni ca gāyana // Jss_1,13.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1757: pūtā suśīlā dharmiṣṭhā suvratā strī pati-vratā /
GR14jnass01u:1758: man-mantropāsakāś caiva tebhyaḥ pūtottamāḥ sadā // Jss_1,13.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1760: śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ pūjanaṃ ca yathā carvita-carvaṇam // Jss_1,13.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1761: bhaktyā tīrthāni pūtāni svataḥ pūto hi vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1762: tat tantraṃ ca tathā dāna-malaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca niṣphalam // Jss_1,13.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1763: śrāddhasya sampradānaṃ ca kartuś ca puruṣa-trayam /
GR14jnass01u:1764: puruṣāṇāṃ śataṃ muktaṃ ko bhuṅkte śrāddha-vastu ca // Jss_1,13.21 //
GR14jnass01u:1765: kecid evaṃ vadantīti pitṛ-lokārtham eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1766: tad-viruddhaṃ ca te tuṣṭā mantra-grahaṇa-mātrataḥ // Jss_1,13.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1767: teṣāṃ śubhāśiṣaṃ karma naiva bhogāya kalpate /
GR14jnass01u:1768: devān na prabhaved vatsa siddha-dhānye yathāṅkuraḥ // Jss_1,13.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1770: mantropāsakād anye karma-bhogaṃ ca bhuñjate // Jss_1,13.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1771: mayā svayaṃ pradattaś ca sva-mantraḥ puruṣāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:1772: para-dvārād grāhayitvā bhaktaṃ muktaṃ karomy aham // Jss_1,13.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1773: mayā pradatta-mantraś ca purā mṛtyuñjayas tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1776: kapilāya ca śeṣāya gaṇeśāya ca mahā-mate // Jss_1,13.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1778: punar mahā-viṣṇave ca viśvāni yasya lomasu // Jss_1,13.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1780: upendrāya ca kāmāya bhṛgave 'ṅgirase tathā // Jss_1,13.29 //
GR14jnass01u:1782: śavitryai viṣṇu-māyāyai pārṣadebhyaś ca putraka // Jss_1,13.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1783: tubhyaṃ na datto mantro 'tra śrūyatāṃ tan nimittakam /
GR14jnass01u:1785: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ gaccha vatsa yathā sukham /
GR14jnass01u:1788: daśābdānte vapus tyaktvā brahma-putro bhaviṣyasi // Jss_1,13.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1790: ity evam uktvā sarvātmā tatraivāntaradhīyata // Jss_1,13.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1791: gandharvaḥ prayayau tasmād yoṣidbhiḥ saha putraka /
GR14jnass01u:1792: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pūrva-vṛttāntam eva ca // Jss_1,13.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1796: śrī-śuka uvāca prayāte rādhikā-nāthe golokaṃ ca nirāmayam /
GR14jnass01u:1797: babhūva kiṃ rahasyaṃ ca gate gandharva-puṅgave // Jss_1,14.1 //
GR14jnass01u:1798: śrī-vyāsa uvāca sarve devāś ca munayaḥ prayāte paramātmani /
GR14jnass01u:1799: sarve babhūvus te tūṣṇīṃ vayāṃsīva dinātyaye // Jss_1,14.2 //
GR14jnass01u:1802: śrī-mahā-deva uvāca rakṣitā yasya bhagavān kalyāṇaṃ tasya santatam /
GR14jnass01u:1803: sa yasya vighna-kartā ca rakṣituṃ taṃ ca kaḥ kṣamaḥ // Jss_1,14.4 //
GR14jnass01u:1805: vighnaṃ kartuṃ ke samarthās teṣāṃ ca munayaḥ surāḥ // Jss_1,14.5 //
GR14jnass01u:1806: kopāgnināṃ sthalaṃ kutra stambhitānāṃ ca sāmpratam /
GR14jnass01u:1807: devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca kṣaṇenaiveśvarecchayā // Jss_1,14.6 //
GR14jnass01u:1808: yadi tiṣṭhanti bhūmau ca dagdha-śasyā vasundharā /
GR14jnass01u:1809: jale yadi tatas taptaṃ naṣṭhāste jala-jantavaḥ // Jss_1,14.7 //
GR14jnass01u:1810: sthāle dahanti lokāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃś ca pralayāgnayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1811: vidhānaṃ kartum ucitam eṣāṃ ca jagatāṃ vidhe // Jss_1,14.8 //
GR14jnass01u:1812: tvam eva dhātā jagatāṃ pitā ca viṣṇur īśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1815: ājñāvahāś ca satataṃ dik-pālāś ca dig-īśvarāḥ // Jss_1,14.10 //
GR14jnass01u:1816: tasyaivājñāvaho dharmaḥ sākṣī ca karmaṇāṃ nṛṇām /
GR14jnass01u:1817: bhramanti viṣaye śaśvan mohitā māyayā hareḥ // Jss_1,14.11 //
GR14jnass01u:1818: ahaṃ na pātā na sraṣṭā na saṃhartā ca jīvanām /
GR14jnass01u:1819: nirlipto ' haṃ tapasvī ca harer ārādhanonmukhaḥ // Jss_1,14.12 //
GR14jnass01u:1820: saṃhāra-viṣayaṃ mahyaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca purā dadau /
GR14jnass01u:1821: datvā rudrāya tad ahaṃ tapasyāsu rato hareḥ // Jss_1,14.13 //
GR14jnass01u:1824: mṛtyuñjayo ' haṃ adhunā na ca kālād bhayaṃ mama /
GR14jnass01u:1825: kālaḥ saṃharate sarvaṃ māṃ vinā ca tatheśvaram // Jss_1,14.15 //
GR14jnass01u:1826: purā sarvādi-sarge ca kasyacit sraṣṭur eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1827: bhālodbhavāś ca te rudrās teṣv eko ' haṃ śaṅkaraḥ // Jss_1,14.16 //
GR14jnass01u:1828: kalpaś ca brahmaṇaḥ pāte laye prākṛtike tathā /
GR14jnass01u:1829: sarve naṣṭā viṣayiṇo na bhaktāś ca yatheśvaraḥ // Jss_1,14.17 //
GR14jnass01u:1830: asaṃkhya-brahmaṇaḥ pātaḥ kalpaś cāsaṃkhya eva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1831: samatītaḥ kati-vidho bhavitā yā punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,14.18 //
GR14jnass01u:1833: tatra prākṛtikāḥ sarve tiro-bhūtāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Jss_1,14.19 //
GR14jnass01u:1834: na prākṛto na viṣayī nitya-dehī ca vaiṣṇavaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1835: harer vareṇāmaro 'haṃ śivādhāras tatas tataḥ // Jss_1,14.20 //
GR14jnass01u:1836: jala-plutaṃ ca viśvaughaṃ laye prākṛtike dhruvam /
GR14jnass01u:1838: sarvā devyo vilīnāś ca kṛṣṇaḥ satyaṃ suniścitam /
GR14jnass01u:1839: sarve pumāṃso līnāś ca satye nitye sanātane // Jss_1,14.22 //
GR14jnass01u:1840: ahaṃ kṛṣṇaś ca prakṛtiḥ pārṣada-pravaro hareḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1841: nityaṃ nityā vidyamānā goloke ca nirāmaye // Jss_1,14.23 //
GR14jnass01u:1842: eka īśo na dvitīya iti sarvādi-sargataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1843: nahi naśyanti tad-bhaktāḥ prakṛti-prākṛte laye // Jss_1,14.24 //
GR14jnass01u:1844: tasya bhaktottamānāṃ ca satataṃ smaraṇena ca /
GR14jnass01u:1845: āyur-vyayo nahi bhavet kathaṃ mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // Jss_1,14.25 //
GR14jnass01u:1847: teṣāṃ bhaktottamānāṃ ca satataṃ smaraṇena ca // Jss_1,14.26 //
GR14jnass01u:1849: atra kalpe bhavān brahmā vyavasthātā ca karmasu // Jss_1,14.27 //
GR14jnass01u:1850: sthalaṃ kopānalānāṃ ca vidhānaṃ yad vidhe kuru /
GR14jnass01u:1851: śambhoś ca vacanaṃ śrutvā kampitaḥ kamalāsanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1852: sthalaṃ cakāra vahnīnām ājñayā śaṅkarasya ca // Jss_1,14.28 //
GR14jnass01u:1853: brahmovaca jvaras tri-pādas tri-śirāḥ ṣaḍ-bhujo nava-locanaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1856: prākṛteṣu ca deheṣu vyāpāro 'sya mayā kṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.30 //
GR14jnass01u:1857: mama kopānalaḥ śambho saṃskṛtāgnir dvijasya ca /
GR14jnass01u:1858: bhave bhavatu sarvatra vyāpāro 'sya mayā kṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.31 //
GR14jnass01u:1859: śeṣasya kopa-vahniś ca śeṣāsye 'stv adhunā śiva /
GR14jnass01u:1860: yato viśvaṃ ca pralaye dahed gomaya-piṇḍavat // Jss_1,14.32 //
GR14jnass01u:1862: bhvatv eva hi sarvatra sarveṣām upakārakaḥ // Jss_1,14.33 //
GR14jnass01u:1863: dharmāsya-kopa-vahniś ca kṛṣṇāgniś ca bhavatv ayam /
GR14jnass01u:1864: adharmaṃ kurvatāṃ sarvaṃ dāhanaṃ ca kariṣyati // Jss_1,14.34 //
GR14jnass01u:1865: sūrya-kopānalaś cāyaṃ dāvāgniś ca vaneṣu ca /
GR14jnass01u:1866: sthitir asya taroḥ skandhe tad-bhakṣyāḥ paśu-pakṣiṇaḥ // Jss_1,14.35 //
GR14jnass01u:1868: dampatyor virahe śaśvad bhakṣyati sma dvayos tanum // Jss_1,14.36 //
GR14jnass01u:1869: indra-kopānalaḥ sadyo vajrāgniś ca babhūva ha /
GR14jnass01u:1870: upendrasyānalaś caiva vidyud eva bhvatv ayam // Jss_1,14.37 //
GR14jnass01u:1871: rudrāṇām āsya-vahniś ca maholkāgnir bhavatv ayam /
GR14jnass01u:1872: gaṇeśāgniḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu yathāsthāne tu tiṣṭhati // Jss_1,14.38 //
GR14jnass01u:1873: yatra tiṣṭhet tad uṣaram evam evaṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1874: skanda-kopānalaś caiva raṇāstrāgnir babhūva ha // Jss_1,14.39 //
GR14jnass01u:1876: jagrāhaurva-munis tatra tejasi brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,14.40 //
GR14jnass01u:1878: brahmaṇaṃ ca namas-kṛtya śaṅkaraṃ tapase yayau // Jss_1,14.41 //
GR14jnass01u:1880: sa babhūva purā putra paramaurvānalaḥ svayam // Jss_1,14.42 //
GR14jnass01u:1881: kāmāgnim ulvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicintya manasā vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1882: samālocya suraiḥ sārdhaṃ munīndraiḥ saha saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.43 //
GR14jnass01u:1883: ajuhāva striyaḥ sarvāḥ suvratāś ca pati-vratāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1884: āyuyur yoṣitaḥ sarvās tā ūcuḥ kamalodbhavam // Jss_1,14.44 //
GR14jnass01u:1885: striya ūcuḥ kim asmān brūhi bhagavan śādhi naḥ karavāma kim /
GR14jnass01u:1886: ālocya manasā sarvaṃ dehi bhāraṃ vayaṃ striyaḥ // Jss_1,14.45 //
GR14jnass01u:1887: brahmovāca gṛhītvā madanāgniṃ ca maithune sukha-dāyakam /
GR14jnass01u:1888: viśve ca yoṣitaḥ sarvāḥ śaśvat-kāmā bhavantu ca // Jss_1,14.46 //
GR14jnass01u:1890: tam ūcuḥ yoṣitaḥ sarvā bhayaṃ tyaktvā ca saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.47 //
GR14jnass01u:1891: striya ūcuḥ dhik tvāṃ jagad-vidhiṃ vyarthaṃ cakāra parameśvaraḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1893: gṛhītvā madanāgniṃ ca puruṣāś ca tathā striyaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1894: nityaṃ dahanti satataṃ vāstavaṃ duḥsahaṃ param // Jss_1,14.49 //
GR14jnass01u:1896: tena dugdhāḥ striyaḥ sarvāś cāsmākam apareṇa kim // Jss_1,14.50 //
GR14jnass01u:1897: samarpaṇaṃ cet puruṣe yad yasmāsu smarānalaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1898: bhasmī-bhūtaṃ kariṣyāmo rakṣitā ko bhavet tava // Jss_1,14.51 //
GR14jnass01u:1899: pati-vratā-vacaḥ śrutvā tam uvāca śivaḥ svayam /
GR14jnass01u:1902: śrī-mahā-deva uvāca tyaja dvandvaṃ mahā-bhāga suvratābhiḥ sahādhunā /
GR14jnass01u:1903: pati-vratānāṃ tejaś ca sarvebhyaś ca paraṃ bhavet // Jss_1,14.53 //
GR14jnass01u:1904: nirmāṇaṃ kuru devendra kṛtyāṃ strī-jātim īśvara /
GR14jnass01u:1905: tasyai dehi duḥkha-bījaṃ kāma-kopānalaṃ param // Jss_1,14.54 //
GR14jnass01u:1906: śaṅkarasya vacaḥ śrutvā satvaraṃ jagatāṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1907: sasṛje tat-kṣaṇaṃ mūrtiṃ strī-rūpāṃ sumanoharāṃ // Jss_1,14.55 //
GR14jnass01u:1908: aho rūpam aho veśam aho asyā navaṃ vayaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1909: aho cakṣuḥ kaṭākṣaṃ ca munīnāṃ mohayan manaḥ // Jss_1,14.56 //
GR14jnass01u:1911: vicitraṃ kaṭhinaṃ sthūlaṃ śroṇi-yugmaṃ ca sundaram // Jss_1,14.57 //
GR14jnass01u:1916: vapuḥ sukomalam cālaṃ nāti-dīrghaṃ na vakharam /
GR14jnass01u:1923: tasyai dadau ca kāmāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kamalodbhavaḥ // Jss_1,14.63 //
GR14jnass01u:1924: dṛṣṭvā sā candra-rūpaṃ ca kāmonmattā vicetanā /
GR14jnass01u:1925: kṛtvā kaṭākṣaṃ smerāśyā māṃ bhajasvety uvāca sā // Jss_1,14.64 //
GR14jnass01u:1926: saspitaḥ prayayau candro lajjayā ca sabhā-talāt /
GR14jnass01u:1927: kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca cakame kāmārtā sā gata-trapā // Jss_1,14.65 //
GR14jnass01u:1928: dudrāva kāmas tasmāc ca tat-paścāt sā dadhāva ca /
GR14jnass01u:1929: jahasur devatāḥ sarvā munayaś cāpi saṃsadi // Jss_1,14.66 //
GR14jnass01u:1930: lajjitā yoṣitah sarvās tāṃ vārayitum akṣamāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1931: sarve cakruḥ parīhāsaṃ strī-vargaṃ śaṅkarādayaḥ // Jss_1,14.67 //
GR14jnass01u:1932: kāmaṃ na labdhvā sā ca strī nivṛtyāgatya saṃsadi /
GR14jnass01u:1933: tam aśvinī-kumāraṃ cāpy uvāca sura-sannidhau // Jss_1,14.68 //
GR14jnass01u:1934: kṛtyā-kāminy uvāca māṃ bhajasva raveḥ putra priyāṃ rasavatīṃ mudā /
GR14jnass01u:1935: śṛṅgāre sukhadāṃ śāntāṃ parāṃ kāmāturāṃ varāṃ // Jss_1,14.69 //
GR14jnass01u:1936: tvayā śārdhaṃ bhramiṣyāmi sundare gahane vane /
GR14jnass01u:1937: rahasi rahasi krīḍāṃ kariṣyāmi divāniśam // Jss_1,14.70 //
GR14jnass01u:1938: madhu-pānaṃ ca dāsyāmi vāsitaṃ cāmalaṃ jalam /
GR14jnass01u:1939: sakarpūraṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ bhoga-vastu manoharam // Jss_1,14.71 //
GR14jnass01u:1942: kumāra uvāca vacanaṃ vada vāme mām ātmano hṛdayaṅgama /
GR14jnass01u:1943: vihāya kapaṭaṃ kānte kapaṭaṃ dharma-nāśanam // Jss_1,14.73 //
GR14jnass01u:1945: tad-ācāraṃ kati-vidhaṃ tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,14.74 //
GR14jnass01u:1946: aśvinīja-vacaḥ śrutvā kāmārtā tam uvāca sā /
GR14jnass01u:1947: kāmārtānāṃ kva lajjā ca kva bhayaṃ mānam eva ca // Jss_1,14.75 //
GR14jnass01u:1949: kāminy uvāca sthānaṃ nāsti kṣaṇaṃ nāsti nāsti dūtī tad uttamā /
GR14jnass01u:1950: tenaiva yuvatīnāṃ ca satītvam upajāyate // Jss_1,14.76 //
GR14jnass01u:1952: tad rātraṃ ca pulakitaṃ yonau kaṇḍūyanaṃ paraṃ // Jss_1,14.77 //
GR14jnass01u:1954: sarvaṃ tyajati tad-dhetoḥ putraṃ kāntaṃ gṛhaṃ dhanam // Jss_1,14.78/ //
GR14jnass01u:1955: labdhvā yuvānaṃ puruṣaṃ deśa-tyāgaṃ karoti sā /
GR14jnass01u:1956: tad-uttamaṃ punar labdhvā taṃ tyajet sā kṣaṇena ca // Jss_1,14.79 //
GR14jnass01u:1957: viṣaṃ dātuṃ samarthā sā svāminaṃ guṇināṃ varam /
GR14jnass01u:1958: mlecchaṃ yuvānaṃ samprāpya sarvasvaṃ dātum utsukā // Jss_1,14.80 //
GR14jnass01u:1959: tyajet kula-bhayaṃ lajjāṃ dharmaṃ bandhuṃ yaśaḥ śriyam /
GR14jnass01u:1960: samprāpya rati-śūraṃ ca yuvānaṃ suratonmukham // Jss_1,14.81 //
GR14jnass01u:1962: hṛdayaṃ kṣura-dhārābhaṃ ko vā jānāti tan-manaḥ // Jss_1,14.82 //
GR14jnass01u:1963: vidyucchaṭā jale rekhā cāsthirā ca yathāmbare /
GR14jnass01u:1964: tathāsthirā ca kulaṭā-prītiḥ svapnaṃ ca tad-vacaḥ // Jss_1,14.83 //
GR14jnass01u:1965: kulaṭānāṃ na satyaṃ ca na ca dharmo bhayaṃ dayā /
GR14jnass01u:1966: na laukikaṃ na lajjā syāj jāra-jintā nirantaram // Jss_1,14.84 //
GR14jnass01u:1967: svapne jāgaraṇe caiva bhojane śayane sadā /
GR14jnass01u:1968: nirantaraṃ kāma-cintā jāre sneho na cānyataḥ // Jss_1,14.85 //
GR14jnass01u:1970: jārārthe ca sutaṃ hanti bāndhavasya ca kā kathā // Jss_1,14.86 //
GR14jnass01u:1971: na hi vedā vidanty evaṃ kulatā-hṛdayaṅgamam /
GR14jnass01u:1972: kathaṃ devās ca munayaḥ santo jānanti niścayam // Jss_1,14.87 //
GR14jnass01u:1973: rati-śūraṃ priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣīraṃ ghṛtam ivācaret /
GR14jnass01u:1974: gate vayasi jīrṇaṃ taṃ viṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyajet kṣaṇāt // Jss_1,14.88 //
GR14jnass01u:1975: na viśvaseyus tāṃ duṣṭo tasmāt santo hi santataṃ /
GR14jnass01u:1976: na ripuḥ puruṣāṇāṃ ca duṣṭa-strībhyaḥ paro bhuvi // Jss_1,14.89 //
GR14jnass01u:1977: viṣaṃ mantrād upaśamaṃ jalād vahniś ca niścitaṃ /
GR14jnass01u:1978: agneś ca kaṇṭhakocchannaṃ durjanaḥ stavanād vaśaḥ // Jss_1,14.90 //
GR14jnass01u:1979: lubdho dhanena rājā ca sevayā satataṃ vaśaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1980: miśraṃ svaccha-svabhāvena bhayena ca ripur vaśaḥ // Jss_1,14.91 //
GR14jnass01u:1982: bandhur vaśaḥ samatayā guruḥ praṇatibhiḥ sadā // Jss_1,14.92 //
GR14jnass01u:1983: mūrkho vaśaḥ kathāyāṃ ca vidvān vidyā-vicārataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:1984: na hi duṣṭā ca kulaṭā puṃsaś ca vaśagā bhavet // Jss_1,14.93 //
GR14jnass01u:1986: na sarvasya vaśī-bhūtā vinā śṛṅgāram ulvaṇam // Jss_1,14.94 //
GR14jnass01u:1987: na prītyā na dhanenaiva na stavān na sevayā /
GR14jnass01u:1988: na prāṇa-dānato veśyā vaśī-bhūtā bhavet kṣaṇam // Jss_1,14.95 //
GR14jnass01u:1989: āhāro dvi-guṇas tāsāṃ buddhis tāsāṃ catur-guṇā /
GR14jnass01u:1990: ṣaḍ-guṇā mantraṇā tāsāṃ kāmaś cāṣṭa-gunaḥ smṛtaḥ // Jss_1,14.96 //
GR14jnass01u:1991: śaśvat-kāmā ca kulaṭā na ca tṛptiś ca krīḍayā /
GR14jnass01u:1993: divāniśaṃ ca śṛṅgāraṃ kurute tat-pumān yadi /
GR14jnass01u:1994: na tṛptiḥ kulaṭānāṃ ca pumāṃsaṃ grastum icchati // Jss_1,14.98 //
GR14jnass01u:1996: nāntakaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ nāsāṃ tṛpyati sampadām // Jss_1,14.99 //
GR14jnass01u:1997: na śreyasāṃ manas tṛptaṃ vāḍavāgnir na pāthasām /
GR14jnass01u:1998: vasundharā na rajasāṃ na puṃsāṃ kulaṭā tathā // Jss_1,14.100 //
GR14jnass01u:1999: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ kiṃcit sarvaṃ vaktuṃ ca nocitam /
GR14jnass01u:2000: lajjā bījaṃ yoṣitāṃ ca nibodha bhāskarātmaja // Jss_1,14.101 //
GR14jnass01u:2001: śrutvā ca kṛtyā-strī-vākyaṃ jahasur munayaḥ surāḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2002: cukupur yoṣitaḥ sarvāḥ padmādyā lajjitāḥ suta // Jss_1,14.102 //
GR14jnass01u:2004: tat paścāt pārvatī sārdhaṃ sarasvatyā natānanā // Jss_1,14.103 //
GR14jnass01u:2005: sāvitrī rohinī svāhā vāruṇī ca ratiḥ śacī /
GR14jnass01u:2006: sarvā babhūvur ekatra pracakrur mantraṇāṃ ca tāḥ // Jss_1,14.104 //
GR14jnass01u:2007: kṛtyā-striyaḥ samāhūya tā ūcuś ca krameṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:2008: rodhayām āsur iṣṭāṃ tāṃ sugopyāṃ api yoṣitaḥ // Jss_1,14.105 //
GR14jnass01u:2009: tasyā mukhe dadau hastaṃ suśīlā kamalālayā /
GR14jnass01u:2010: salajjitā bhava sute śāntā ceti śubhāśiṣam // Jss_1,14.106 //
GR14jnass01u:2011: sarasvatī dadau tasyai cābhimānaṃ ca dhairyatām /
GR14jnass01u:2013: sāvitrī ca dadau tasyai sauśīlyaṃ cātidurlabham /
GR14jnass01u:2014: ātma-saṃgopanaṃ caiva gāmbhīryaṃ kulato bhayam // Jss_1,14.108 //
GR14jnass01u:2015: pārvaty uvāca dhik tvāṃ sva-bhāva-kulaṭāṃ lajjitā bhava sundari /
GR14jnass01u:2016: sva-mānaṃ gauravaṃ rakṣa hy asmākaṃ ca smarātura // Jss_1,14.109 //
GR14jnass01u:2017: jani labha pṛthivyāṃ ca kāya-vyūhaṃ vidhāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:2018: puṃsām aṣṭa-guṇaṃ kāmaṃ labhasva ca pṛthak prṛthak // Jss_1,14.110 //
GR14jnass01u:2019: lajjāṃ catur-guṇāṃ cāpi dviguṇāṃ dhairyatāṃ tathā /
GR14jnass01u:2020: abhogecchadhame gaccha dūraṃ gaccha mamāntikāt // Jss_1,14.111 //
GR14jnass01u:2021: puṃsāṃ ca dvi-guṇaḥ kāmo vāstavīṇāṃ ca yoṣitām /
GR14jnass01u:2022: lajjā cāṣṭa-guṇā cāpi dhairyatā ca catur-guṇā // Jss_1,14.112 //
GR14jnass01u:2024: śaśvat tiṣṭhatu puṃsy eva strīṣu ca mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.113 //
GR14jnass01u:2026: strī-sva-bhāvaṃ ca papraccha yajña-bhāk na bhavet tataḥ // Jss_1,14.114 //
GR14jnass01u:2028: cikitsakānāṃ viduṣāṃ na bhakṣya mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.115 //
GR14jnass01u:2029: ity evam uktvā prayayur devyaś ca sarva-yoṣitaḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2030: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye ca samāgataḥ // Jss_1,14.116 //
GR14jnass01u:2031: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye sarvataḥ suta /
GR14jnass01u:2032: pati-vratāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ ca lajjā bīja-svarūpiṇī // Jss_1,14.117 //
GR14jnass01u:2037: sva-yogena jahau dehaṃ bhārate prāktanād aho // Jss_1,15.1 //
GR14jnass01u:2038: sa jajñe śudra-yonau ca pituḥ śāpena ca daivataḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2039: viṣṇu-prasādaṃ bhuktvā ca babhūva brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,15.2 //
GR14jnass01u:2046: uvāsa tatra śambhuś ca nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2047: pārvatī bhadra-kālī skando gaṇa-patiḥ svayam // Jss_1,15.6 //
GR14jnass01u:2048: mahā-kālaś ca nandī ca vīra-bhadraḥ pratāpavān /
GR14jnass01u:2049: siddhā maharṣayaś ca munayaḥ sankādayaḥ // Jss_1,15.7 //
GR14jnass01u:2051: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ dhyānaṃ subhadrāya ca kānane // Jss_1,15.8 //
GR14jnass01u:2053: pūjā-vidhānaṃ yad yac ca puraś-caraṇa-pūrvakam // Jss_1,15.9 //
GR14jnass01u:2054: tad eva bhagavān śambhuḥ pradadau nāradāya ca /
GR14jnass01u:2055: uvāca śambhuṃ devarṣir yogināṃ ca guror gurum /
GR14jnass01u:2056: pārvatī-sannidhau tatra nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,15.10 //
GR14jnass01u:2058: sad yat pṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,15.11 //
GR14jnass01u:2059: yad yat pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahman pratyekaṃ ca krameṇa ca /
GR14jnass01u:2060: punaḥ praśnaṃ kuru mune śṛṇvantu mat-sabhāsadaḥ // Jss_1,15.12 //
GR14jnass01u:2061: ādhyātmikaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ vedānāṃ sāram uttamam /
GR14jnass01u:2062: jñānaṃ jñāniṣu sāraṃ yat kṛṣṇa-bhakti-pradaṃ śubhaṃ // Jss_1,15.13 //
GR14jnass01u:2064: tat-siddhi-yogān muktiś ca yoginām api vāñcchitam // Jss_1,15.14 //
GR14jnass01u:2068: bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca yatīnāṃ brahma-cāriṇām // Jss_1,15.16 //
GR14jnass01u:2070: pati-vratānāṃ yad yac ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-pūjanaṃ ca yat // Jss_1,15.17 //
GR14jnass01u:2071: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ mantraṃ puraś-caraṇam īpsitam /
GR14jnass01u:2072: sārvāhnikam abhīṣṭaṃ ca vipākaṃ karma-jīvinām // Jss_1,15.18 //
GR14jnass01u:2074: tayoḥ paraṃ vā yad brahma tasyāvatāra-varṇanam // Jss_1,15.19 //
GR14jnass01u:2075: kas tat kalāvatīrṇaś ca kas tad-aṃśaś tathaiva ca /
GR14jnass01u:2076: paripūrṇatamaḥ kaś ca kaḥ pūrṇaḥ kaḥ kalāṃśakaḥ // Jss_1,15.20 //
GR14jnass01u:2077: kasya vārādhane śambho kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ yaśas tathā /
GR14jnass01u:2080: yad dattaṃ kiṃ tad deveśa tad-ārādhyaś ca kaḥ suraḥ // Jss_1,15.22 //
GR14jnass01u:2082: sudurlabhaṃ ca viśveṣu noktaṃ māṃ brahmaṇā purā // Jss_1,15.23 //
GR14jnass01u:2083: sanat-kumāro jānāti noktaṃ tena purā ca mām /
GR14jnass01u:2084: mayā jñānam anāpṛṣṭaṃ yad yaj jānāsi maṅgalam // Jss_1,15.24 //
GR14jnass01u:2086: tan me kathaya bhadreśa mām evānugrahaṃ kuru // Jss_1,15.25 //
GR14jnass01u:2088: purāṇeṣv itihāse ca vedāṅgeṣu sudurlabham // Jss_1,15.26 //
GR14jnass01u:2089: guroś ca jñānodigaraṇāt jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2090: tat tantaṃ sa ca mantraḥ syāt kṛṣṇa-bhaktir yato bhavet // Jss_1,15.27 //
GR14jnass01u:2091: jñānaṃ syād viduṣāṃ kiṃcid veda-vyākhyānataḥ prabho /
GR14jnass01u:2093: tasmād bhavān paraṃ jñānaṃ vada veda-vidāṃ vara /
GR14jnass01u:2094: māṃ bhaktam anuraktaṃ ca śaraṇāgatam īśvara // Jss_1,15.29 //
GR14jnass01u:2095: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā yogināṃ ca guror guruḥ /
GR14jnass01u:2096: bhagavatyā sahālocya jñānaṃ vaktuṃ samudyataḥ // Jss_1,15.30 //
GR14jnass01u:2097: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvākhyānaṃ manoharam /
